start
tat tu samanvayāt

original: vedāntāḥ siddhabrahmaparā uta kāryaparā iti niṣphalatvasāpekṣatvayoḥ prasaṅgāprasaṅgābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvasūtre dvitīyavarṇakenākṣepasaṃgatyā  #
analyzed: vedāntāḥ siddha brahma parāḥ uta kārya parāḥ iti niṣphala tva sāpekṣa tvayoḥ prasaṅga aprasaṅgābhyām saṃśaye pūrva sūtre dvitīya varṇakena ākṣepa saṃgatyā
pūrvapakṣam āha katham punar ityādinā
sat eva somya etyādīnām sarva ātma tva ādi spaṣṭa brahma liṅgānām brahmaṇi samanvaya ukteḥ
śruti ādi saṃgatayaḥ
siddhānte tad siddhiḥ iti vivekaḥ
katham iti ākṣepe hetuḥ yāvatā iti

original: yato jaiminisūtreṇa śāstrasya vedasya kriyāparatvaṃ darśitamato 'kriyārthatvādvedāntanāmānarthakyaṃ phalavadarthaśūnyatvaṃ prāptamityanvayaḥ
analyzed: yatas jaimini sūtreṇa śāstrasya vedasya kriyā paratvam darśitam atas kriyā artha tvāt vedānta nāma ānarthakyam phalavat artha śūnyatvam prāptam iti anvayaḥ
sūtrasya ayam arthaḥ prathama sūtre tāvat vedasya adhyayana karaṇaka bhāvanā vidhi bhāvyasya phalavat artha para tvam uktam

original: 'codanālakṣaṇor'tho dharmaḥ'iti dvitīyasūtre dharme kārye codanā pramāṇamiti vedaprāmāṇyavyāpakaṃ kāryaparatvamavasitam /
analyzed: codanā lakṣaṇaḥ ūrthaḥ dharmaḥ iti dvitīya sūtre dharme kārye codanā pramāṇam iti veda prāmāṇya vyāpakam kārya para tvam avasitam

original: tatra'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā'ityādyarthavādānāṃ dharme prāmāṇyamasti na veti saṃśaye
analyzed: tatra vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhāḥ ityādi arthavādānām dharme prāmāṇyam asti na vā iti saṃśaye

original: āmnāyaprāmāṇyasya kriyārthatvena vyāptatvāt arthavādeṣu dharmasyāpratīteḥ akriyārthānāṃ
analyzed: āmnāya prāmāṇyasya kriyā artha tvena vyāpta tvāt arthavādeṣu dharmasya apratīteḥ akriyā arthānām
teṣām ānarthakyam niṣphala artha tvam

original: na cādhyayanavidhyupāttānāṃ niṣphale siddher'the prāmāṇyaṃ yuktaṃ,
analyzed: na ca adhyayana vidhi upāttānām niṣphale siddhi arthe prāmāṇyam yuktam
tasmāt anityam eṣām prāmāṇyam ucyate
vyāpaka abhāvāt vyāpyam prāmāṇyam na asti eva iti yāvat

original: evaṃ pūrvapakṣe 'pi 'vidhinā tvekavākyatvāt stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ'iti sūtreṇa siddhāntamāha--kriyāparatvamiti /
analyzed: evam pūrvapakṣe vidhinā tu eka vākya tvāt stuti arthena vidhīnām syuḥ iti sūtreṇa siddhāntam āha kriyā paratvam iti
anityam iti prāpte darśitam iti arthaḥ

original: vāyurvai kṣipratamagāminī devatā taddevatākaṃ karma kṣiprameva phalaṃ dāsyati,
analyzed: vāyuḥ vai kṣipratama gāminī devatā tad devatākam karma kṣipram eva phalam dāsyati

original: ityevaṃ vidheyārthānāṃ stutirūpārthena dvāreṇa 'vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta'ityādi vidhivākyenaikavākyatvādarthavādāḥ saphalāḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: iti evam vidheya arthānām stuti rūpa arthena dvāreṇa vāyavyam śvetam ālabheta etyādi vidhi vākyena eka vākya tvāt arthavādāḥ saphalāḥ syuḥ
stuti lakṣaṇayā sa phala kārya para tvāt pramāṇam arthavādāḥ iti yāvat
nanu adhyayana vidhi gṛhītānām vedāntānām ānarthakyam na yuktam iti atas āha kartṛ iti

original: na vayaṃ vedāntānāmānarthakyaṃ sādhayāmaḥ kintu loke siddhasya mānābhāvāntaravedyatvānniṣphalatvācca
analyzed: na vayam vedāntānām ānarthakyam sādhayāmaḥ kintu loke siddhasya māna abhāva antara vedya tvāt niṣphala tvāt ca
siddha brahma paratve teṣām māna antara sāpekṣa tva niṣphala tvayoḥ prasaṅgāt aprāmāṇya āpātāt
kārya śeṣa kartṛ devatā phalānām prakāśana dvārā kārya para tvam vaktavyam iti brūmaḥ
tatra tu antar padārtha vākyānām kartṛ devatā stāvaka tvam
vividiṣā ādi vākyānām phala stāvaka tvam

original: nanu karmaviśeṣamanārabhya prakaraṇāntarādhītānāṃ vedāntānāṃ kathaṃ taccheṣakatvaṃ,
analyzed: nanu karma viśeṣam an ārabhya prakaraṇa antara adhītānām vedāntānām katham tad śeṣaka tvam
māna abhāvāt iti arucyā pakṣa antaram āha aupāsana iti
sat brahma abhedam āropya aham brahma asmi iti upāsīta iti upāsanā vidhiḥ
ādi śabdāt śravaṇa ādayaḥ
tad kārya paratvam vā vaktavyam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu śrutaṃ brahma vihāyāśrutaṃ kāryaparatvaṃ kimarthaṃ vaktavyamiti tatrāha--nahīti /
analyzed: nanu śrutam brahma vihāya aśrutam kārya paratvam kimartham vaktavyam iti tatra āha nahi iti
paritas samantāt niścayena sthitam pariṣṭhitam kṛti anapekṣam
siddham iti yāvat
tasya pratipādanam ajñātasya vedena jñāpanam
tat na saṃbhavati
mā anantara yogya irthe vākyasya saṃvāde sati anuvādaka tvāt
agniḥ himasya bheṣajam iti vākya vat
visaṃvāde tu bodhaka tvāt
ādityaḥ yūpaḥ iti vākya vat iti arthaḥ
siddhaḥ na veda arthaḥ
māna antara yogya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti uktvā niṣphala tvāt ca tathā iti āha tathā iti
siddha jñāpane heya upādeya agocare phala abhāvāt ca tat na saṃbhavati iti arthaḥ
phalam hi sukha vyāptiḥ duḥkha hānidh ca
tat ca pravṛtti nivṛttibhyām sādhyam

original: te copādeyasya pravṛttiprayatnakāryasya heyasyanivṛttiprayatnakāryasya jñānābhyāṃ jāyete,
analyzed: te ca upādeyasya pravṛtti prayatna kāryasya heyasya nivṛtti prayatna kāryasya jñānābhyām jāyete
na siddha jñānāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: tarhi siddhabodhivedavādānāṃ sāphalyaṃ kathasityāśaṅya 'āmnāyasya'ityādisaṃgrahavākyaṃ vivṛṇoti-ata eveti /
analyzed: tarhi siddha bodhi veda vādānām sāphalyam katham iti āśaṅya āmnāyasya etyādi saṃgraha vākyam vivṛṇoti atas eva iti
siddha vastu jñānāt phala abhāvāt eva iti arthaḥ

original: 'devairniruddhaḥ so 'gnirarodīt'iti vākyasyāśrujatvena rajatasya nindādvārā 'barhiṣi na deyaṃ'iti sabhalaniṣedhaśeṣatvavat vedāntānāṃ vidhayādiśeṣatvaṃ  #
analyzed: devaiḥ niruddhaḥ saḥ agniḥ arodi iti vākyasya aśru ja tvena rajatasya nindā dvārā barhiṣi na deyam iti sabhala niṣedha śeṣa tva vat vedāntānām
vācyam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu teṣāṃ mantravat svātantryamastu nārthavādavadvidhyekavākyatvamityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntāsiddhimāha-mantrāṇāṃ ceti /
analyzed: nanu teṣām mantra vat svātantryam astu na arthavāda vat vidhi ekavākyatvam iti āśaṅkya dṛṣṭānta asiddhim āha mantrāṇām ca iti

original: prathamādhyāye pramāṇalakṣaṇer'thavādacintānantaraṃ mantracintā kṛtā-'iṣe tvā'iti mantre 'chinadmi'ityadhyāhārācchākhācchedanakriyāpratīteḥ,
analyzed: prathama adhyāye pramāṇa lakṣaṇa irthavāda cintā anantaram mantra cintā kṛtā ā iṣe tvā iti mantre chinadmi iti adhyāhārāt śākhā chedana kriyā pratīteḥ

original: 'agnirmūrdhā'ityādau ca kriyāsādhanadevatādipratīteḥ mantrāḥ śrutyādibhiḥ kratau viniyuktāḥ,
analyzed: agniḥ mūrdhā ityādau ca kriyā sādhana devatā ādi pratīteḥ mantrāḥ śruti ādibhiḥ kratau viniyuktāḥ

original: te kimuccāraṇamātreṇādṛṣṭaṃ kurvantaḥ kratāvupakurvanti uta dṛṣṭenaivārthasmaraṇeneti
analyzed: te kim uccāraṇa mātreṇa adṛṣṭam kurvantaḥ kratau upakurvanti uta dṛṣṭena eva artha smaraṇena iti
saṃdehe cintā ādinā api adhyayana kāla avagata mantra arthasya smṛti saṃbhavāt adṛṣṭa arthāḥ mantrāḥ
iti prāpte siddhāntaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ tu vākya arthaḥ iti loka vedayoḥ vākya arthasya aviśeṣāt mantra vākyānām
dṛṣṭena eva sva artha prakāśanena kratu upakāraka tva saṃbhavāt
dṛṣṭe saṃbhavati adṛṣṭa kalpanā anupapatteḥ
phalavat anuṣṭhāna apekṣitena kriyā tad sādhana smaraṇena dvāreṇa mantrāṇām karma aṅga tvam
mantraiḥ eva arthaḥ smartavyaḥ iti niyamaḥ tu adṛṣṭa arthaḥ iti
tathā ca arthavādānām stuti padārtha dvārā pada eka vākya tvam vidhibhiḥ
mantrāṇām tu vākya artha jñāna dvārā taiḥ vākya eka vākya tvam iti vibhāgaḥ
nanu astu karma prakaraṇa stha vākyānām vidhi eka vākya tvam

original: vedāntānāṃ tu siddhe prāmāṇyaṃ kiṃ na syāditi tatrāha-na kvaciditi /
analyzed: vedāntānām tu siddhe prāmāṇyam kim na syāt iti tatra āha na kvacid iti
vedāntāḥ vidhi eka vākya tvena eva arthavantaḥ
siddhārtha āvedaka tvāt
mantra arthavāda ādi vat iti arthaḥ
anyatra adṛṣṭā api vedānteṣu kalpyatām iti tatra āha aupapannā vā iti
na iti anuṣaṅgaḥ
siddhe phala abhāva asya ukta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: tarhi brahmaṇyeva svārthe vidhiḥ kalpyatāṃ kṛtaṃ vedāntānāṃ vidhyanataraśeṣatvenetyata āha--na ceti /
analyzed: tarhi brahmaṇi eva svārthe vidhiḥ kalpyatām kṛtam vedāntānām vidhi anatara śeṣatvena iti atas āha na ca iti
nanu dadhnā juhoti iti siddhe dadhani vidhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tatra āha kriyā iti
dadhnaḥ kriyā sādhanasya prayujyamāna tayā sādhya tvāt vidheya tā
niṣkriya brahmaṇaḥ katham api asādhya tvāt na vidheya tvam iti arthaḥ
bhāṭṭa matam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
svayam eva arucim vadan pakṣa antaram āha atha iti
siddhānta sūtram vyācaṣṭe tuśabdaḥ iti
tat brahma vedānta pramāṇakam iti pratijñāta arthe hetum pṛcchati katham iti
hetum āha sam iti
anvaya tātparya viṣaya tvam tasmāt iti eva hetuḥ

original: tātparyasya samyaktvaṃ akhaṇḍārthaviṣayakatvaṃ sūcayituṃ sam-padaṃ pratijñāntargatameva /
analyzed: tātparyasya samyaktvam akhaṇḍa artha viṣayaka tvam sūcayitum sampadam pratijñā antargatam eva
tathā ca akhaṇḍam brahma vedānta ja pramā viṣayaḥ
vedānta tātparya viṣaya tvāt
yaḥ yad vākya tātparya viṣayaḥ sa tad vākya prameyaḥ
yathā karma vākya prameyaḥ dharmaḥ iti prayogaḥ
vākya arthasya akhaṇḍa tvam asaṃsṛṣṭa tvam
vākyasya ca akhaṇḍa arthaka tvam sva pada upasthitāḥ ye padārthāḥ teṣām yaḥ saṃsarḥ tad gocara pramā janaka tvam
na ca idam aprasiddham

original: prakṛṣṭaprakāśaścandra ityādi lakṣaṇavākyānāṃ loke lakṣaṇayā candrādivyaktimātrapramāhetutvāt /
analyzed: prakṛṣṭa prakāśaḥ candraḥ ityādi lakṣaṇa vākyānām loke lakṣaṇayā candra ādi vyakti mātra pramā hetu tvāt
sarva pada lakṣaṇā ca aviruddhā sarvaiḥ arthavāda padaiḥ ekasyāḥ stuteḥ lakṣya tu aṅgīkārāt

original: tathā satyajñānādipadairakhaṇḍaṃ brahma bhātīti na pakṣāsiddhiḥ /
analyzed: tathā satya jñāna ādi padaiḥ akhaṇḍam brahma bhāti iti na pakṣa asiddhiḥ
nā api hetu asiddhiḥ
upakrama ādi liṅgaiḥ vedāntānām advitīya akhaṇḍa brahmaṇi tātparya nirṇayāt
chāndogya ṣaṣṭhe upakramam darśayati sat eva iti
uddālakaḥ putram uvāca he somya priya darśana
idam sarvam jagat
agre utpatteḥ prāc kāle sat abādhitam brahma eva āsīt
eva kāreṇa jagataḥ pṛthak sattā niṣidhyate
sajātīya vijātīya svagata bheda nirāsa artham ekam eva advitīyam iti pada trayam
evam advitīyam brahma upakramya aitadātmyam idam sarvam iti upasaṃharati
idam upakrama upasaṃhāra aikarūpyam tātparya liṅgam
yathā tat tvam asi
iti nava kṛtvas bhyāsaḥ

original: rūpādihīnādvitīyabrahmaṇo mānāntarāyogyatvadapūrvatvamuktam-'atra vāva kila sat somya na nibhālayase'iti /
analyzed: rūpa ādi hīna advitīya brahmaṇaḥ māna antara ayogya tva dapūrva tvam uktam atra vāva kila sat somya na nibhālayase iti
saṃghāte sthitam pratyak brahma na jānāsi iti arthaḥ

original: 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye atha saṃpatsye'iti brahmajñānātphalamuktaṃ viduṣaḥ /
analyzed: tasya tāvat eva ciram yāvat na vimokṣye atha saṃpatsye iti brahma jñānāt phalam uktam viduṣaḥ

original: tasya yāvatkālaṃ deho na vimokṣyate tāvadeva dehapātaparyanto vilambaḥ /
analyzed: tasya yāvatkālam dehaḥ na vimokṣyate tāvat eva dehapāta paryantaḥ vilambaḥ
atha dehapāta anantaram vidvān brahma saṃpatsyate
videha kaivalyam anubhachavanti iti arthaḥ
anena jīvena ātmanā anupraviśya etya ādi advitīya jñāna artha ūrthavādaḥ
mṛd ādi dṛṣṭān ataiḥ prakṛti atirekeṇa vikāraḥ na asti iti upapattiḥ uktā

original: evaṃ ṣaṅvidhāni tātparyaliṅgāni vyastāni samastāni vā prativedāntaṃ dṛśyanta ityaitareyopakramavākyaṃ paṭhati-ātmā vā iti /
analyzed: evam ṣaṅvidhāni tātparya liṅgāni vyastāni samastāni vā prati vedāntam dṛśyante iti aitareya upakrama vākyam paṭhati ātmā vai iti
bṛhadāraṇyake madhu kāṇḍa upasaṃhāra vākyam satā ātmanaḥ nirviśeṣa tva artham āha tat etat iti
māyābhiḥ bahu rūpam tat brahma
etat aparokṣam
apūrvam kāraṇa śūnyam
anaparam kārya rahitam
anantaram jāti antaram asya na asti iti anantaram
ekarasam iti arthaḥ
a bāhyam a dvitīyam
tasya aparokṣa tvam upapādayati ayam iti
sarvam anubhavati iti sarva anubhūḥ
cit mātram iti arthaḥ
ṛk yajuḥ sāma vākyān uktvā ātharvaṇa vākyam āha brahma eva idam iti

original: yatpurastātpūrvadigvastujātamidamabrahmeva viduṣāṃ bhāti tadamṛtaṃ brahmaiva vastu ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yat purastāt pūrva diś vastu jātam idam abrahma iva viduṣām bhāti tat amṛtam brahma eva vastu iti arthaḥ
ādi padena satyam jñānam ityādi vākyāni gṛhyante
nanu astu brahmaṇaḥ tātparya viṣaya tvam

original: vedāntānāṃ kāryamevārthaḥ kiṃ na syāditi tatrāha--na ceti /
analyzed: vedāntānām kāryam eva arthaḥ kim na syāt iti tatra āha na ca iti

original: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi tātparyeniścīyamāne kāryārthatvaṃ na yuktaṃ 'yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ'iti nyāyādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vedāntānām brahmaṇi kārya artha tvam na yuktam yad paraḥ śabdaḥ sa śabda arthaḥ iti nyāyāt iti arthaḥ

original: yaduktamarthavādanyāyena vedāntānāṃ kartrādistāvakatvamiti tatrāha--na ca teṣāmiti /
analyzed: yat uktam arthavāda nyāyena vedāntānām kartṛ ādiḥ tāvaka tvam iti tatra āha na ca teṣām iti

original: teṣāṃ karmaśeṣastāvakatvaṃ na bhāti kintu jñānadvārā karma tatsādhananāśakatvameva /
analyzed: teṣām karma śeṣaḥ tāvaka tvam na bhāti kintu jñāna dvārā karma tad sādhana nāśaka tvam eva

original: tattatra vidyākāle kaḥ kartā kena karaṇena kaṃ viṣayaṃ paśyet iti śruterityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tat tatra vidyā kāle kaḥ kartā kena karaṇena kam viṣayam paśyet iti śruteḥ iti arthaḥ
arthavādānām tu svārthe phala abhāvāt stuti lakṣaṇa tā iti bhāvaḥ

original: yaduktaṃ siddhatvena mānāntaravedyaṃ brahma na vedārtha iti tatrāha--na ca parīti /
analyzed: yat uktam siddha tvena māna antara vedyam brahma na veda arthaḥ iti tatra āhana ca pari iti
tattvam asi iti śāstram antareṇa iti saṃbandhaḥ
dharmaḥ na veda arthaḥ
sādhya tvena pāka vat māna antara vedya tvāt

original: yadi vedaṃ vinā dharmasyānirṇayānna mānāntaravedyatā tadā brahmaṇyapi tulyam /
analyzed: yadi vedam vinā dharmasya anirṇayāt na māna antara vedya tā tadā brahmaṇi api tulyam

original: yaccoktaṃ niṣphalatvādbrahma na vedārtha iti tadanūdya pariharati--yattvityādinā /
analyzed: yat ca uktam niṣphala tvāt brahma na veda arthaḥ iti tat anūdya pariharati yat tu ityādinā
rahita tvāt bhinna tvāt
brahmaṇaḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: yadapyuktam--'upāsanāparatvaṃ vedāntānām'iti tatra kiṃ prāṇapañcāgnyādivākyānāmuta sarveṣāmiti /
analyzed: yat api uktam upāsanā para tvam vedāntānām iti tatra kim prāṇa pañcāgni ādi vākyānām uta sarveṣām iti

original: ādye, adhyastaguṇavatastasya taccheṣatve 'pi na dvitīya ityāha--natu tatheti /
analyzed: ādye adhyasta guṇavataḥ tasya tad śeṣa tve pi na dvitīyaḥ iti āhana tu tathā iti

aham brahma asmi

original: ityekatve jñāte sati heyopādeyaśūnyatayā brahmātmanaḥ phalābhāvāt,

dṛḍhasya iti śeṣaḥ

original: saṃskārotthaṃ tu bhrāntitvena niścite na vidhinimittam /

yena iti
upāsanāyām kāraṇasya sattvena iti arthaḥ

karmakāṇḍa irthavāda ādīnām iti arthaḥ
tathā ca vyāpaka abhāvāt vedānteṣu vyāpya abhāva anumānam iti bhāvaḥ
vedāntāḥ na sva arthe mānam
akriyā artha tvāt saḥ rodi ityādi vat iti anumāne niṣphala arthaka tvam upādhiḥ iti āha tathā api iti
arthavādānām niṣphala svārtha amāna tve pi iti arthaḥ
tad viṣayasya tad karaṇasya
svārthe brahma ātmani iti śeṣaḥ

original: saphalajñānakaraṇatvena vedāntānāṃ svārthe mānatvasiddherna kriyārthakatvaṃ tadvyāpakamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sa phala jñāna karaṇa tvena vedāntānām svārthe mānatva siddheḥ na kriyā arthaka tvam tad vyāpakam iti bhāvaḥ
nanu mā abhūt veda prāmāṇyasya vyāpakam kriyā arthaka tvam
vyāpyam tu bhaviṣyati
tad abhavāt vedāntānām durjñānam iti
na iti āha na ca iti

original: yena vedaprāmāṇyaṃ svasyānumānagamyatvenānyatra kvaciddṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭāntamapekṣeta tadeva nāstītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yena veda prāmāṇyam svasya anumāna gamya tvena anyatra kvacid dṛṣṭam dṛṣṭāntam apekṣeta tat eva na asti iti arthaḥ
cakṣuḥ ādi vat vedasya svatas prāmāṇya jñānāt na tad vyāpti liṅga ādi apekṣā

original: prāmāṇyasaṃśaye tu phalavadajñātābādhitārthatātparyāt prāmāṇyaniścayo na kriyārthatvena /
analyzed: prāmāṇya saṃśaye tu phalavat ajñāta abādhita artha tātparyāt prāmāṇya niścayaḥ na kriyā artha tvena
kūpe patet iti vākye vyabhicārāt iti bhāvaḥ
varṇaka artham upasaṃharati tasmāt iti

original: vidhivākyānāmapi phalavadajñātārthatvena prāmāṇyaṃ tattulyaṃ vedāntānāmapīti sthitam /

brahmaṇaḥ māna antara ayogya tvāt

analyzed: saṃprati sarveṣām padānām kārya anvita arthe śaktim icchatām vidhi śeṣa tvena pratyak brahma

original: vedāntairbodhyate na svātantryeṇeti vadatāṃ vṛttikārāṇāṃ matanirāsāya sūtrasya varṇakāntaramārabhyate /
analyzed: vedāntaiḥ bodhyate na svātantryeṇa iti vadatām vṛtti kārāṇām mata nirāsāya sūtrasya varṇaka antaram ārabhyate

iti

original: asyāḥ ko viṣaya ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyādivākyairvidhiparaireva brahmasamarpyata ityāha--pratipattīti /
analyzed: asyāḥ kaḥ viṣayaḥ iti ākāṅkṣāyām satya ādi vākyaiḥ vidhi paraiḥ eva brahma samarpyate iti āha pratipatti iti
vidhi viṣaya pratipatti viṣaya tayā iti arthaḥ
vidhi parāt vākyāt tad śeṣa lābhe dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā iti

original: 'yūpe paśuṃ badhnāti' 'āhavanīye juhoti' 'indraṃ yajeta'iti vidhiṣu ke yūpādaya ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ 'yūpaṃ takṣati,
analyzed: yūpe paśum badhnāti āhavanīye juhoti indram yajeta eti vidhiṣu ke yūpa ādayaḥ iti ākāṅkṣāyām yūpam takṣati
aṣṭa aśrīkaroti iti takṣaṇa ādi saṃskṛtam dāru yūpaḥ
agnīn ādadhīta eti ādhāna saṃskṛtaḥ gniḥ āhavanīyaḥ
vajrahastaḥ purandaraḥ iti vidhi paraiḥ eva vākyaiḥ samarpyante tadvat brahma iti arthaḥ
vidhi para vākyasya api anya artha bodhi tve vākya bhedaḥ syāt iti śaṅkā nirāsa artham apiśabdaḥ

original: mānāntarājñātānyapi śeṣatayocyante na pradhānatveneti na vākyabhedaḥ /

original: vṛddhavyavahāre ca śrotuḥ pravṛttinivṛttī uddiśyāpūrvaprayogo dṛśyate /

tasya vedasya
kāryam veda arthaḥ iti atra codanā sūtra stham bhāṣyam āha codanā iti

original: kriyāyā niyogasya jñānadvārā pravartakaṃ vākyaṃ codanetyucyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ niyogasya jñāna dvārā pravartakam vākyam codanā iti ucyate iti arthaḥ
śabarasvāmi saṃmatim uktvā jaimini saṃmatim āha tasya jñānam iti
tasya dharmasya jñāpakam apauruṣeya vidhi vākyam upadeśaḥ
tasya dharmeṇa avyatirekāt iti arthaḥ
padānām kārya anvita arthe śaktiḥ iti atra sūtram paṭhati tad bhūtānām iti

original: tattatra vede bhūtānāṃ siddhārthaniṣṭhānāṃ padānāṃ kriyārthena kāryavācinā liṅgādipadena samāmnāyaḥ sahoccāraṇaṃ kartavyam /
analyzed: tat tatra vede bhūtānām siddhārtha niṣṭhānām padānām kriyā arthena kārya vācinā liṅga ādi padena samāmnāyaḥ saha uccāraṇam kartavyam
padārtha jñānasya vākya artha rūpa kārya dhī nimitta tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: kāryānvitārthe śaktāni padāni kāryavācipadena saha padārthasmṛtidvārā kāryameva vākyārthaṃ bodhayantīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kārya anvita arthe śaktāni padāni kārya vāci padena saha padārtha smṛti dvārā kāryam eva vākya artham bodhayanti iti bhāvaḥ
phalitam āha atas iti
yatas vṛddhāḥ evam āhuḥ
atas vidhi niṣedha vākyam eva śāstram
arthavāda ādikam tu tad śeṣa tayā upakṣīṇam
tena karma śāstreṇa sāmānyam śāstra tvam
tasmāt vedāntānām kārya para tvena eva arthava tvam syāt iti

original: nanu vedānteṣu niyojyasya vidheyasya cādarśanātkathaṃ kāryadhīriti /
analyzed: nanu vedānteṣu niyojyasya vidheyasya ca adarśanāt katham kārya dhīḥ iti
tatra āhasati ca iti
nanu dharma brahma jijñāsā sūtra kārābhyām iha kāṇḍa dvaye ṛtha bhedaḥ uktaḥ
eka kārya artha tve śāstra bheda anupapatteḥ

original: tatra kāṇḍadvaye jijñāsyabhede sati phalavailakṣyaṇyaṃ vācyam /
analyzed: tatra kāṇḍa dvaye jijñāsya bhede sati phala vailakṣyaṇyam vācyam

original: tathā ca na muktiphalāya jñānasya vidheyatā,
analyzed: tathā ca na mukti phalāya jñānasya vidheya tā
mukteḥ vidheya kriyā janya tve karma phalāt aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt aviśeṣe jijñāsya bheda asiddheḥ
atas karma phala vilakṣaṇa tvāt nitya siddha mukteḥ tad vyañjaka jñāna vidhiḥ ayuktaḥ iti āśaṅkate nanu iha iti
mukteḥ karma phalāt vailakṣaṇyam asiddham iti tad artham jñānam vidheyam

original: na ca tarhi saphalaṃ kāryameva vedānateṣvapi jijñāsyamiti tadbhedāsiddhiriti vācyaṃ, iṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: na ca tarhi saphalam kāryam eva vedānateṣu api jijñāsyam iti tad bheda asiddhiḥ iti vācyam iṣṭa tvāt
na ca brahmaṇaḥ jijñāsya tva sūtra virodhaḥ
jñāna vidhi śeṣa tvena sūtrakṛtā brahma pratipādanāt iti pariharati na iti
brahmaṇaḥ vidhi prayukta tvam sphuṭayati ātmā vai iti

original: 'brahma veda'ityatra brahmabhāvakāmo brahmavedane kuryāditi vidhiḥ pariṇamyata iti draṣṭavyam /

nanu kim vidhi phalam iti tat āha tad upāsanāt iti

original: pratyagbrahmopāsanāt 'brahmavidāpnoti param'iti śāstrokto mokṣaḥ svargavallokāprasiddhaḥ phalamityarthaḥ /

original: kiñca yadi jñānādeva muktistadā śravaṇajanyajñānāntaraṃ mananādividhirna syāt,

original: mokṣastu atīndriyoviśokaḥ śarīrādyabhogyo viṣayādyajanyo 'nātmavitsvaprasiddha iti vailakṣaṇyajñānāya pratyakṣādīni viśeṣaṇāni /

analyzed: nāradena uktaḥ sanatkumāraḥ tasmai tapasā dagdha kilbiṣāya nāradāya tamasaḥ śoka nidāna ajñānasya
jñānena nivṛtti rūpam pāram brahma darśitavān iti arthaḥ
etat yaḥ vedasaḥ vidyā granthim vikirati iti vākyam ādi śabda arthaḥ
evam śruteḥ tatva pramā mukti hetuḥ na karma iti uktam
tatra akṣapāda gautama muni saṃmatim āha tathā ca iti
gauraḥ ham iti mithyājñānasya apāye rāga dveṣa moha ādi doṣāṇām nāśaḥ
doṣa apāyāt dharma adharma svarūpa pravṛtteḥ apāyaḥ
pravṛti apāyāt punar deha prāpti rūpa janma apāyaḥ

original: evaṃ pāṭhakrameṇottarottarasya hetunāśānnāśe sati tasya pravṛttirūpahetoranantarasya kāryasya janmano 'pāyāduḥkhadhvaṃsarūpo 'ravargo bhavatītyarthaḥ
analyzed: evam pāṭha krameṇa uttarottarasya hetu nāśāt nāśe sati tasya pravṛtti rūpa hetoḥ anantarasya kāryasya upāyā duḥkha dhvaṃsa rūpaḥ ravargaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ
nanu pūrva sūtre tatva jñānāt niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ iti ukte sati itara padārtha bhinna ātma tattva jñānam

original: kathaṃ mokṣaṃ sādhayatītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ mithyājñānanivṛttidvāreṇeti vaktumidaṃ sūtraṃ pravṛttam /
analyzed: katham mokṣam sādhayati iti ākāṅkṣāyām mithyājñāna nivṛtti dvāreṇa iti vaktum idam sūtram pravṛttam

original: tathācca bhinnātmajñānānmuktiṃ vadatsūtraṃ saṃmataṃ cet paramatānujñā syādityata āha--mithyeti /
analyzed: bhinna ātma jñānāt muktim vadat sūtram saṃmatam ced paramata anujñā syāt iti atas āha mithyā iti

original: tattvajñānānmuktirityaṃśe saṃmatiruktā bhedajñānaṃ tu 'yatra hi dvaitamivabhavati'iti
analyzed: tattva jñānāt muktiḥ iti aṃśe saṃmatiḥ uktā bheda jñānam tu yatra hi dvaitam iva bhavati iti

original: śrutyā bhrāntitvāt 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati'iti śrutyā anarthahetutvācca
analyzed: śrutyāḥ bhrānti tvāt mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti yaḥ iha nānā iva paśyati iti śrutyāḥ anartha hetu tvāt ca
na mukti hetuḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nanu brahma ātma eka tva vijñānam api bheda jñāna vat na pramā
saṃpad ādi rūpa tvena bhrānti tvāt iti atas āha na ca idam ityādinā
alpa ālambana tiraskāreṇa utkṛṣṭa vastu abheda dhyānam saṃpad
yathā manaḥ svavṛtti ānantyāt anantam

original: tata utkṛṣṭā viśvedevā apyanantā ityanantatvasāmyāt viśvedevā eva mana iti sampattayānantaphalaprāptirbhavati tathā cetanatvasāmyājjīve brahmābhedaḥ  #
analyzed: tatas utkṛṣṭāḥ viśvedevāḥ api anantāḥ iti ananta tva sāmyāt viśvedevāḥ eva manaḥ iti sampad tayā ananta phala prāptiḥ bhavati tathā cetana tva sāmyāt jīve brahma abhedaḥ
saṃpad iti na ca iti arthaḥ
ālambanasya prādhānyena dhyānam pratīka upāstiḥ adhyāsaḥ
yathā brahma dṛṣṭyā manasaḥ ādityasya vā

original: tathā ahaṃ brahmeti jñānamadhyāso netyāha -na ceti /
analyzed: tathā aham brahma iti jñānam adhyāsaḥ na iti āha na ca iti
ādeśaḥ upadeśaḥ

original: kriyāviśeṣo viśiṣṭakriyā tathā yogo nimittaṃ yasya dhyānasya tattathā /
analyzed: kriyā viśeṣaḥ viśiṣṭa kriyā tathā yogaḥ nimittam yasya dhyānasya tat tathā
yathā pralaya kāle vāyuḥ agni ādīn saṃvṛṇoti saṃharati iti saṃvargaḥ

original: svāpakāle prāṇo vāgādīnsaṃharatīti saṃhārakriyāyogātsaṃvarga iti dhyānaṃ chāndogye vihitaṃ,
analyzed: svāpa kāle prāṇaḥ vāc ādīn saṃharati iti saṃhāra kriyā yogāt saṃvargaḥ iti dhyānam chāndogye vihitam
tathā vṛddhi kriyā yogāt jīvaḥ brahma iti jñānam iti na iti āhana api iti

original: yathā patnyavekṣitamājyaṃ bhavati iti upāṃśuyājādyaṅgasyājyasya saṃskārakamavekṣaṇaṃ vihitaṃ tathā karmaṇi kartṛtvenāṅgasyātmanaḥ saṃskārārthaṃ  #
analyzed: yathā patnī avekṣitam ājyam bhavati iti upāṃśuyāja ādi aṅgasya ājyasya saṃskārakam avekṣaṇam vihitam tathā karmaṇi kartṛ tvena aṅgasya ātmanaḥ saṃskāra artham
brahma jñānam na iti āha na api ājyā iti
pratijñā catuṣṭaye hetum āha saṃpad ādi iti

original: upakramādiliṅgairbrahmātmaikatvavastuni pramitiheturyaḥ samānādhikaraṇavākyānāṃ padaniṣṭhaḥ samanvayastātparyaṃ niścitaṃ tatpīḍyeta /
analyzed: upakrama ādi liṅgaiḥ brahma ātma ekatva vastuni pramiti hetuḥ yaḥ samāna adhikaraṇa vākyānām pada niṣṭhaḥ samanvayaḥ tātparyam niścitam tat pīḍyeta
kim ca eka tva jñānāt ājñānika hṛdayasya antaḥkaraṇasya yaḥ rāga ādi granthiḥ cit mayaḥ tādātmya rūpa ahaṅkāra granthiḥ vā naśyati iti ajñāna nivṛtti phala vākya bādhaḥ
sampad ādi jñānasya aprama tvena ajñāna anivartaka tvāt
kiñca jīvasya brahmatva saṃpadā katham tad bhāvaḥ
pūrva rūpe sthite naṣṭe vā anyasya anya ātma tā yogāt
tasmāt na saṃpad ādi rūpam iti arthaḥ
saṃpad ādi rūpa tva abhāve phalitam āha atas iti
pramā tvāt na kṛti sādhyā kim tarhi nityā eva
na pramāṇa sādhyā iti arthaḥ

original: uktarītyā siddhabrahmarūpamokṣasya kāryasādhyatvaṃ tajjñānasya niyogaviṣayatvaṃ ca kalpayitumaśakyaṃ kṛtyasādhyatvādityāha-evaṃbhūtasyeti /
analyzed: ukta rītyā siddha brahma rūpa mokṣasya kārya sādhya tvam tad jñānasya niyoga viṣaya tvam ca kalpayitum aśakyam kṛtya sādhya tvāt iti āha evaṃbhūtasya iti
nanu brahma kārya aṅgam
kāraka tvāt patnī avekṣaṇa karma kāraka ājya vat iti ced
kim jñāne brahmaṇaḥ karma kāraka tvam uta upāsanāyām
na adya iti āha na ca iti

original: śābdajñānaṃ vidikriyāśabdārthaḥ-viditaṃ kāryaṃ aviditaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasmādadhi anyadityarthaḥ /
analyzed: śābda jñānam vidi kriyā śabda arthaḥ viditam kāryam aviditam kāraṇam tasmāt adhi anyat iti arthaḥ

original: yenātmanā idaṃ sarvaṃ dṛśyaṃ loko jānāti taṃ kena karaṇena jānīyāt /
analyzed: yena ātmanā idam sarvam dṛśyam lokaḥ jānāti tam kena karaṇena jānīyāt
tasmāt aviṣayaḥ ātmā iti arthaḥ
na dvitīyaḥ iti āha tathā iti

original: 'yanmanasā na manute'iti śrutyā loko manasā yadbrahma na jānātītyaviṣayatvamuktvā tadevāvedyaṃ brahma tvaṃ viddhi /
analyzed: yat manasā na manute iti śrutyā lokaḥ manasā yat brahma na jānāti iti aviṣaya tvam uktvā tat eva avedyam brahma tvam viddhi
tat tu upādhi viśiṣṭam devatā ādikam iti upāsate janāḥ na idam brahma iti arthaḥ
brahmaṇaḥ śābda bodha aviṣaya tve pratijñā hāniḥ iti śaṅkate aviṣaya tve iti
vedānta janya vṛtti kṛta avidyā nivṛtti phala śāli tayā śāstra pramāṇaka tvam vṛtti viṣaya tve pi sva prakāśa brahmaṇaḥ vṛtti abhivyakta sphuraṇa aviṣaya tvāt aprameya tvam iti
pariharati na iti
paratvāt phala tvāt iti arthaḥ
nivṛtti rūpa brahma tātparyāt iti vā arthaḥ
uktam vivṛṇoti nahi iti
a viṣaya tā a nidantayā
adṛśya tve śrutim āha tathā ca iti

original: yasya brahmāmataṃ caitanyaviṣaya iti niścayastena samyagavagatam /
analyzed: yasya brahmā amatam caitanya viṣayaḥ iti niścayaḥ tena samyak avagatam

original: yasya tvajñasya brahma caitanyaviṣaya iti mataṃ sa na veda /
analyzed: yasya tu ajñasya brahma caitanya viṣayaḥ iti matam sa na veda
uktam eva dārḍhya artham anuvadati avijñātam iti
aviṣaya tayā brahma vijānatām avijñātam adṛśyam iti pakṣaḥ

original: ajñānāṃ tu brahma vijñātaṃ dṛśyamiti pakṣa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ajñānām tu brahma vijñātam dṛśyam iti pakṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
dṛṣṭeḥ draṣṭāram cākṣuṣa manaḥ vṛtteḥ sākṣiṇam

original: anayā dṛśyayā dṛṣṭyā na paśyervijñāterbuddhivṛtterniścayarūpāyāḥ sākṣiṇaṃ tathā na viṣayīkuryādityāha-neti /
analyzed: anayā dṛśyayā dṛṣṭyā na paśyeḥ vijñāteḥ buddhi vṛtteḥ niścaya rūpāyāḥ sākṣiṇam tathā na viṣayīkuryāt iti āha na iti

original: nanvavidyādinivartakatvena śāstrasya prāmāṇye 'pi nivṛtterāgantukatvānmokṣasyanityatvaṃ syāditi netyāha-ata iti /
analyzed: nanu avidyā ādi nivartaka tvena śāstrasya prāmāṇye pi nivṛtteḥ āgantuka tvāt mokṣasya anitya tvam syāt iti nā iti āha atas iti
tattva jñānāt iti arthaḥ
dhvaṃsasya nitya tvāt ātma rūpa tvāt ca na anitya tva prasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: utpattivikārāptisaṃskārarūpaṃ caturvidhameva kriyāphalaṃ tadbhinnatvānmokṣasya nopāsanāsādhyatvamityāha-yasya tu ityādinātasmājjñānamekaṃ muktvā  #
analyzed: utpatti vikāra āpti saṃskāra rūpam caturvidham eva kriyā phalam tad bhinna tvāt mokṣasya na upāsanā sādhya tvam iti āha yasya tu ityādinā tasmāt jñānam ekam muktvā
ityantena

original: tathā utpādyatvavat vikāryatve cāpekṣata iti yuktamityanvayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā utpādya tva vat vikārya tve ca apekṣate iti yuktam iti anvayaḥ
dūṣayati tayoḥ iti
sthitasya avasthā antaram vikāraḥ
nanu anitya tva nirāsāya kriyayā sthitasya eva brahmaṇaḥ grāma vat āptiḥ astu
na iti āha na ca iti
brahma jīva abhinnam na vā
ubhayathā api āpta tvāt na kriyā apekṣā iti āha sva ātma ityādinā

original: yathā vrīhīṇāṃ saṃskāryatvena prokṣaṇāpekṣā tathā mokṣasya netyāha-nāpītyādinā /
analyzed: yathā vrīhīṇām saṃskārya tvena prokṣaṇa apekṣā tathā mokṣasya na iti āhana api ityādinā
guṇa ādhānam vrīhīṣu prokṣaṇa ādinā
kṣālana ādinā vastra ādau mala apanayaḥ
śaṅkate sva ātma dharmaḥ iti

original: brahmātmasvarūpa eva mokṣo 'nādyavidyāmalākṛta upāsanayā male naṣṭe 'bhivyajyata ityatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ-yatheti /
analyzed: brahma ātma svarūpaḥ eva mokṣaḥ na ādya vidyā mala akṛtaḥ upāsanayā male naṣṭe bhivyajyate iti atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā iti
kiyā ātmani malaḥ satyaḥ kalpitaḥ vā
dvitīye jñānāt eva tad nāśaḥ na kriyayā
ādye kriyā kim ātma niṣṭā anya niṣṭā vā
na ādyaḥ iti āha na kriyā iti
anupapattim sphuṭayati yat iti

original: kriyā hi svāśraye saṃyogādivikāramakurvatī na jāyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kriyā hi sva āśraye saṃyoga ādi vikāram akurvatī na jāyate iti arthaḥ
tat ca vākya bādhanam
na dvitīyaḥ iti āha anyā iti
aviṣaya tvāt
kriyā āśraya dravya asaṃyogi tvāt iti yāvat
darpaṇam tu sa avayavam kriyā āśraya iṣṭakā cūrṇa ādi dravya saṃyogi tvāt saṃskriyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: anyakriyayānyo na saṃskriyata ityatra vyabhicāraṃ śaṅkate-nanviti /
analyzed: anya kriyayā anyaḥ na saṃskriyate iti atra vyabhicāram śaṅkate nanu iti

original: ātmano mūlāvidyāpratibimbitatvena gṛhītasya naro 'hamiti bhrāntyā dehatādātmyamāpannasya kriyāśrayatvabhrāntyā saṃskāryatvabhramānna vyabhicāra  #
analyzed: ātmanaḥ mūlāvidyā pratibimbita tvena gṛhītasya naraḥ ham iti bhrāntyā deha tādātmyam āpannasya kriyā āśraya tva bhrāntyā saṃskārya tva bhramāt na vyabhicāra
iti āhana iti
kaścid iti
yatra ātmani viṣaye ārogya buddhiḥ utpadyate tasya deha saṃhatasya eva ārogya phalam iti anvayaḥ
nanu deha abhinnasya katham saṃskāraḥ
tasya āmuṣmika phala bhoktṛ tva ayogāt iti atas āha tena iti

original: dehasaṃhatenaivāntaḥkaraṇapratibimbātmanā kartāhamiti bhāsamānena pratyayāḥ kāmādayo manastādātmyādasya santīti pratyayinā kriyāphalaṃ bhujyata  #
analyzed: deha saṃhatena eva antaḥkaraṇa pratibimba ātmanā kartāham iti bhāsamānena pratyayāḥ kāma ādayaḥ manaḥ tādātmyāt asya santi iti pratyayinā kriyā phalam bhujyata
iti arthaḥ
manaḥ viśiṣṭasya āmuṣmika bhoktuḥ saṃskāraḥ yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: viśiṣṭasya bhoktṛtvaṃ na kevalasya sākṣiṇa ityatra mānamāha-tayoriti /
analyzed: viśiṣṭasya bhoktṛ tvam na kevalasya sākṣiṇaḥ iti atra mānam āha tayoḥ iti

original: pramātṛsākṣiṇormadhye sattvasaṃsargamātreṇa kalpitakartṛtvādimān pramātā pippalaṃ karmaphalaṃ bhuṅkte,
analyzed: pramātṛ sākṣiṇoḥ madhye sattva saṃsarga mātreṇa kalpita kartṛ tva ādimān pramātā pippalam karma phalam bhuṅkte

original: sa eva śodhitatvenānyaḥ sākṣitayā prakāśata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva śodhita tvena anyaḥ sākṣi tayā prakāśate iti arthaḥ
ātmā dehaḥ
deha ādi yuktam pramātṛ ātmānam iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ sopādhikasya ciddhātormithyāsaṃskāryatvamuktvā nirupādhikasyāsaṃskāryatve mānamāha-eka iti /
analyzed: evam sa upādhikasya ciddhātoḥ mithyā saṃskārya tvam uktvā nirupādhikasya asaṃskārya tve mānam āha ekaḥ iti
sarva bhūteṣu advitīyaḥ ekaḥ devaḥ sva prakāśaḥ
tathā api māyā āvṛta tvāt na prakāśate iti āha gūḍhaḥ iti

original: nanu jīvenāsaṃbandhādbhinnatvādvā devasyābhānaṃ na tu māyāgūhanāditi,
analyzed: nanu jīvena asaṃbandhāt bhinna tvāt vā devasya ābhānam na tu māyā gūhanāt iti
na iti āha sarva vyāpī sarva bhūta antarātmā iti
devasya vibhu tvāt sarva prāṇi pratyak tvāt ca āvaraṇāt eva ābhānam iti arthaḥ
pratyaktve kartṛ tvam syāt iti ced na
karma adhyakṣaḥ
kriyā sākṣī iti arthaḥ
tarhi sākṣyam asti iti dvaita āpattiḥ
na sarva bhūtānām adhiṣṭhānam bhūtvā sākṣī bhavati
sākṣyam adhiṣṭhāne sākṣiṇi kalpitam iti bhāvaḥ
sākṣi śabda artham āha cetā kevalaḥ iti
boddhṛ tve sati akartā sākṣī iti loka prasiddham
cakāraḥ doṣāḥ bhāva samuccaya arthaḥ

original: nirguṇatvānnirdeṣatvācca guṇo doṣanāśo vā saṃskāro notyarthaḥ /

saḥ iti upakramāt śrukra ādi śabdāḥ puṃstvena vācyāḥ

original: tathā ca mokṣe kriyānupraveśo nāstīti vyāhṛtamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca mokṣe kriyā anupraveśaḥ na asti iti vyāhṛtam iti bhāvaḥ
mānasam api jñānam na vidhi yogyā kriyā
vastu tad na tvāt

original: yatra viṣaye tadanapekṣayaiva yā codyate tatra sā hi kriyeti yojanā /
analyzed: yatra viṣaye tad anapekṣayā eva yā codyate tatra sā hi kriyā iti yojanā

gṛhītam adhvaryuṇā iti śeṣaḥ

original: sandhyāṃ devatāmiti caivamādhivākyeṣu yathā yādṛśī dhyānakriyā vastvānapekṣā,
analyzed: sandhyām devatām iti ca evam ādhivākyeṣu yathā yādṛśī dhyāna kriyā vastu anapekṣā

dhyānam api mānasa tvāt jñāna vat na kriyā iti atra āha dhyānam ityādinā
tathā api kriyā eva iti śeṣaḥ
kṛtya sādhya tvam upādhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: dhyānakriyamuktvā tato vailakṣaṇyaṃ jñānasya sphuṭayati-jñānaṃ tviti /

atas pramā tvāt na codanā tantram na vidheḥ viṣayaḥ

abheda sattve pi vidhitaḥ dhyānam kartum śakyam

original: nanu pratyakṣajñānasya viṣayajanyatayā tattantratve 'pi śābdabodhasya tadabhāvādvidheyakriyātvamiti netyāha-evaṃ sarveti /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣa jñānasya viṣaya janya tayā tad tantra tve pi śābda bodhasya tad abhāvāt vidheya kriyā tvam iti na iti āha evam sarva iti
śabda anumāna ādi artheṣu api jñānam avidheya kriyā tvena jñātavyam

tatra evam sati

original: nanu 'ātmānaṃ paśyeta' 'brahma tvaṃ viddhi' 'ātmā draṣṭavyaḥ'iti vijñāne liṅloṭtavyapratyayā vidhāyatāḥ śrūyante,

original: iṣṭaṃ ca svāpekṣayā balavadaniṣṭānanubandhi yattadeva na tātkālikasukhamātraṃ,
analyzed: iṣṭam ca sva apekṣayā balavat aniṣṭa ananubandhi yat tat eva na tātkālika sukha mātram
viṣa saṃyukta anna bhogasya api iṣṭa tva āpatteḥ

original: tathā ca na 'hantavyaḥ'hananaṃ balavadaniṣṭāsādhanatve sati iṣṭasādhanaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca na hantavyaḥ hananam balavat aniṣṭa asādhana tve sati iṣṭa sādhanam na bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: atra ca 'hantavyaḥ'iti hanane viśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatvaṃ bhrāntiprāptamanūdya netyabhāvabodhane balavadaniṣṭasādhanaṃ hananamiti buddhirbhavati,
analyzed: atra ca hantavyaḥ iti hanane viśiṣṭa iṣṭa sādhanatvam bhrānti prāptam anūdya na iti abhāva bodhane balavat aniṣṭa sādhanam hananam iti buddhiḥ bhavati
hanane tātkālika iṣṭa sādhanatva rūpa viśeṣya satvena viśiṣṭa abhāva abuddheḥ viśeṣaṇa abhāva paryavasānāt

original: viśeṣaṇaṃ balavadaniṣṭāsādhanatvamiti tadabhāvo balavadaniṣṭasādhanatvaṃ nañarthaṃ iti paryavasannam /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇam balavat aniṣṭa asādhana tvam iti tad abhāvaḥ balavat aniṣṭa sādhana tvam nañ artham iti paryavasannam
tad buddhiḥ audāsīnya paripālikā iti āha abhāva iti
caḥ pi arthaḥ pakṣa antara dyotī
prakṛti artha abhāva buddhi vat pratyaya artha abhāva buddhiḥ api iti arthaḥ

original: buddheḥ kṣaṇikatvāttadabhāve satyaudāsīnyātpracyutirūpā hananādau pravṛttiḥ syāditi,
analyzed: buddheḥ kṣaṇika tvāt tad abhāve sati audāsīnyāt pracyuti rūpā hanana ādau pravṛttiḥ syāt iti
atra ahasā ca iti

original: yathāgnirindanaṃ dagdhvā śyāmyati evaṃ sā nañarthābhāvabuddhiḥ hananādāviṣṭasādhanatvabhrāntimūlaṃ rāgendhanaṃ dagdhvaiva śāmyatītyakṣarārthaḥ
analyzed: yathā agniḥ indanam dagdhvā śyāmyati evam sā nañ artha abhāva buddhiḥ hananāt āviṣṭa sādhanatva bhrānti mūlam rāga indhanam dagdhvā eva śāmyati iti akṣara arthaḥ
rāga nāśe kṛte pracyutiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: yadvā rāgataḥ prāptā sā kriyā rāganāśe svayameva śāmyatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yat vā rāgataḥ prāptā sā kriyā rāga nāśe svayam eva śāmyati iti arthaḥ

original: parapakṣe tu hananavirodhikriyā kāryetyukte 'pi hananasyeṣṭasādhanatvabhrāntyanirāsāt pracyutirdurvārā /
analyzed: para pakṣe tu hanana virodhi kriyā kāryā iti ukte hananasya iṣṭa sādhanatva bhrānti anirāsāt pracyutiḥ durvārā
tasmāt tad abhāvaḥ eva nañ arthaḥ iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
bhāva artha abhāvena tad viṣayaka kṛtya bhāvāt kārya abhāvaḥ tad śabda arthaḥ
yat vā iti ukta pakṣe nivṛtti upalakṣitam audāsīnyam yasmāt viśiṣṭa abhāva āyattam eva iti vyākhyeyam
svatas siddhasya audāsīnyasya nañ artha sādhya tva upapādana artham nivṛtti upalakṣita tvam iti dhyeyam
tasya baṭoḥ vratam iti anuṣṭheya kriyā vāci vrata śabdena kāryam upakramya na īkṣeta udyantam ādityam iti prajāpati vratam uktam
atas upakrama balāt tatra nañaḥ īkṣaṇa virodhi saṃkalpa kriyā lakṣaṇā aṅgīkṛtā

original: evamagaurasurā adharma ityādau nāmadhātvarthayuktasya nañaḥ pratiṣedhavācitvāyogāt anyaviruddhalakṣakatvam /
analyzed: evam agauḥ asurāḥ adharmaḥ ityādau nāma dhātvartha yuktasya nañaḥ pratiṣedha vāci tva ayogāt anya viruddha lakṣaka tvam
etebhyaḥ prajāpati vrata ādibhyaḥ nyatrābhāvam eva nañ artham manyāmahe iti arthaḥ

original: duḥkhābhāvaphalake nañarthe siddhe niṣedhaśāstramānatvavadvedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi mānatvamiti bhāvaḥ /

tarhi akriyā arthānām ānarthakyam iti sūtram kiṃviṣayam iti
tatra āha tasmāt iti
vedāntānām svārthe phalavat tvāt vyartha kathā viṣayam tat iti arthaḥ
yat api ityādi spaṣṭa artham

original: śravaṇajñānamātrātsaṃsārānivṛttāvapi sākṣātkārājjīvata eva muktirdurapahnayeti sadṛṣṭāntamāha-atrocyata ityādinā /
analyzed: śravaṇa jñāna mātrāt saṃsāra anivṛttau api sākṣātkārāt jīvataḥ eva muktiḥ durapahnayā iti sa dṛṣṭāntam āha atra ucyate ityādinā
brahmā aham iti sākṣītkāra virodhāt iti arthaḥ

original: ātmano dehasaṃbandhasya bhrāntiprayuktatvāttatvadhiyā tannāśarūpamaśarīratvaṃ jīvato yuktamityāha-netyādinā /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ deha saṃbandhasya bhrānti prayukta tvāt tatva dhiyā tad nāśa rūpam aśarīra tvam jīvataḥ yuktam iti āha na ityādinā

original: asaṅgātmarūpaṃ tvaśarīratvaṃ tatvadhiyā jīvato vyajyata ityāha-nityamiti /
analyzed: asaṅga ātma rūpam tu aśarīra tvam tatva dhiyā jīvataḥ vyajyate iti āha nityam iti
deha ātmanoḥ saṃbandhaḥ satyaḥ iti śaṅkate itad kṛtā iti
tad nāśa artham kārya apekṣā iti bhāvaḥ
ātmanaḥ śarīra saṃbandhe jāte dharma adharma utpattiḥ
tasyām satyām saṃbandha janma iti anyonya āśrayāt ekasya asiddhyā dvitīyasya api asiddhiḥ syāt iti pariharati nā ityādinā
nanu etad deha janya dharma adharma karmaṇaḥ etad deha saṃbandha hetu tve syāt anyonya āśrayaḥ
pūrva deha karmaṇaḥ etad deha saṃbandha utpattiḥ

original: pūrvadehaśca tatpūrvadehakṛtakarmaṇa iti bījāṅkuravadanāditvānnāyaṃ doṣa ityata āha-andheti /
analyzed: pūrva dehaḥ ca tad pūrva deha kṛta karmaṇaḥ iti bīja aṅkura vat anādi tvāt na ayam doṣaḥ iti atas āha andha iti
aprāmāṇikī iti arthaḥ

original: na hi bījāṅkuraḥ tato bījāntaraṃ ca yathā pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate tadvadātmano dehasaṃbandhaḥ pūrvakarmakṛtaḥ pratyakṣaḥ /
analyzed: na hi bīja aṅkuraḥ tatas bīja antaram ca yathā pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate tadvat ātmanaḥ deha saṃbandhaḥ pūrva karma kṛtaḥ pratyakṣaḥ

original: svato niṣkriyasyāpi kārakasaṃnidhinā kartṛtvamiti śaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyeṇa nirasyati-neti /

original: tṛtīyādhyāye śrutyādibhiḥśeṣaśeṣitvanirṇayānantaraṃ śeṣiṇāśeṣasya prayogasaṃbhavāt kaḥ kratuśeṣaḥ ko vā puruṣaśeṣaḥ iti vijñāsyata ityarthaḥ

original: vedāntārthaścedadvaitaṃ tarhi dvaitasāpekṣavidhyādīnāṃ kā gatirityāśaṅkya jñānātprāgeva teṣāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na paścādityāha-tasmāditi /

original: sadabādhitaṃ brahma pūrvamātmā viṣayānādatta iti sarvasākṣyahamityevaṃbodhe jāte
analyzed: sat abādhitam brahma pūrvam ātmā viṣayān ādatte iti sarva sākṣī aham iti evaṃbodhe jāte

original: naro 'haṃ kartā mūḍha iti mithyātmābhimānasya ca sarvavyavahārahetorasatve kāryaṃ
analyzed: naraḥ ham kartā mūḍhaḥ iti mithyā ātma abhimānasya ca sarva vyavahāra hetoḥ asatve kāryam

original: jñātavyaparamātmavijñānātprāgevājñānācciddhātorātmānaḥ pramātṛtvaṃ pramātaiva jñātaḥ san pāpmarāgadveṣamaraṇavivarjitaḥ paramātmā syādityarthaḥ

original: śuṅgena liṅgena kāraṇasya svato 'nveṣaṇaṃ darśayanto mānāntarasiddhameva jagatkāraṇaṃ vadantītyāha-sarveṣviti /
analyzed: śuṅgena liṅgena kāraṇasya svatas nveṣaṇam darśayantaḥ māna antara siddham eva jagat kāraṇam vadanti iti āha sarveṣu iti
nanu atīndriya tvena prathāna ādeḥ vyāpti graha ayogāt katham anumānam

yat kāryam tat jaḍa prakṛtikam yathā ghaṭaḥ
yat jaḍam tat cetana saṃyuktam

original: yathā rathādiriti sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānagamyāḥ pradhānapuruṣa saṃyogā ityarthaḥ /

original: sṛṣṭivākyebhya eva parārthānumānarūpebhyo yatkāryaṃ tadbuddhimatkartṛkamitīśvaraṃ kartāraṃ,

original: yatra jñānakāle viduṣaḥ sarvaṃ jagadātmamātramabhūttattadā tu kena kaṃ paśyedityākṣepānnirupādhikaṃ tattvaṃ bhāti /

original: yatra bhumni niścito vidvān dvitīyaṃ kimapi na vetti so 'dvitīyo bhūmā paramātmā nirguṇaḥ /

original: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtam' 'vāgvai gāyatrī' 'yeyaṃ pṛthivī' 'yadidaṃ śarīram'
analyzed: gāyatrī vai idam sarvam bhūtam vāc vai gāyatrī yā iyam pṛthivī yat idam śarīram
yat asmin puruṣe hṛdayam ime prāṇāḥ iti bhūta vāc pṛthivī śarīra hṛdaya prāṇa ātmikā ṣaḍvidhā
ṣaḍbhiḥ akṣaraiḥ catuṣpadā gāyatrī iti

original: yaduktaṃ tāvān tatparimāṇaḥ sarvaḥ prapañco 'sya gāyatryanugatasya brahmaṇo mahimā vibhūtiḥ,
analyzed: yat uktam tāvān tad parimāṇaḥ sarvaḥ prapañcaḥ gāyatrī anugatasya brahmaṇaḥ mahimā vibhūtiḥ
puruṣaḥ tu pūrṇa brahma rūpaḥ
atas prapañcāt jyāyān adhikaḥ
ādhikyam eva āha pādaḥ iti
sarvam jagat ekaḥ pādaḥ oṃśaḥ
viṣṭabhya aham idam kṛtsnam eka aṃśena sthitaḥ jagat iti smṛteḥ

original: asya puruṣasya divi svaprakāśasvarūpe tripādamṛtaṃ rūpamasti,
analyzed: asya puruṣasya divi sva prakāśa svarūpe tripād amṛtam rūpam asti
divi sūrya maṇḍale vā dhyana artham asti
kalpitāt jagataḥ brahma svarūpām anantam asti iti arthaḥ

original: yathā loke pādātpādatrayamadhikaṃ tathedamadhikamiti bodhanārthaṃ tripādamṛtamityuktaṃ,
analyzed: yathā loke pādāt pāda trayam adhikam tathā idam adhikam iti bodhana artham tri pād amṛtam iti uktam
na tri pāda tvam vivakṣitam iti mantavyam
yat atas paras iti yad śabdasya prasiddha artha vāci tvāt pūrva vākya prasiddham brahma grāhmam iti āha tatra iti
nanu yat āgneyaḥ ṣṭākapālaḥ iti atra yad padasya aprakṛta arthaka tvam dṛṣṭim iti atas āha tad para tyajya iti
tatra yāgasya anyatas prasiddheḥ abhāvena apūrva tvāt agatyā prasiddhārtha tvam āśritam

original: iha tu pūrvavākyaprasiddhasya brahmaṇo dyusaṃbandhena pratyabhijñātasya yadarthatvaniśacayādyatpadaikārthakajyotiḥpadasyāpi sa evārtha ityarthaḥ
analyzed: iha tu pūrva vākya prasiddhasya brahmaṇaḥ dyu saṃbandhena pratyabhijñātasya yad artha tva niśacayāt yad pada eka arthaka jyotiḥ padasya api saḥ eva arthaḥ iti arthaḥ
saṃdaṃśa nyāyāt api evam iti āha na kevalam iti
sarvam khalu idam brahma eti uttaratra brahma anuvṛtteḥ madhya stham jyotiḥ vākyam brahma param iti arthaḥ
prakaraṇāt iti
prakṛta apekṣayat pada śrutyā dyu saṃbandha bhūta pāda tva ādi liṅgaiḥ ca iti arthaḥ

original: ataḥ prakaraṇājjyotiḥśrutibādho na yukta iti nirastam /
analyzed: atas prakaraṇāt jyotiḥ śruti bādhaḥ na yuktaḥ iti nirastam
aviśeṣaka tvāt iti
brahma vyāvartaka tva abhāvāt iti arthaḥ

original: yena cetasā caitanyeneddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ sūryastapati prakāśayati taṃ bṛhantamavedavinna manuta ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yena cetasā caitanyena iddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ sūryaḥ tapati prakāśayati tam bṛhantam a veda vid na manute iti arthaḥ

original: jyotiḥśabdasya kāryajyotiṣyeva śaktirityaṅgīkṛtya kāraṇabrahmalakṣakatvamuktvā brahmaṇyapi śaktimāha-yadveti /
analyzed: jyotiḥ śabdasya kārya jyotiṣi eva śaktiḥ iti aṅgīkṛtya kāraṇa brahma lakṣaka tvam uktvā brahmaṇi api śaktim āha yat vā iti

original: gāḍhāndhakāre vācaiva jyotiṣā loka āsanādivyavahāraṃ karotītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: gāḍha andhakāre vācā eva jyotiṣā loke āsana ādi vyavahāram karoti iti arthaḥ

original: ājyaṃ juṣatāṃ pibatāṃ mano jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ bhavati ityājyastutiḥ /
analyzed: ājyam juṣatām pibatām manaḥ jyotiḥ prakāśakam bhavati iti ājya stutiḥ

original: yathā gacchantamanugacchataḥ svasyāpi gatirasti tathā sarvasya svaniṣṭhaṃ bhānaṃ syādityata āha-tasya bhāseti /
analyzed: yathā gacchantam anugacchataḥ svasya api gatiḥ asti tathā sarvasya sva niṣṭham bhānam syāt iti atas āha tasya bhāsā iti

original: tat kālānavacchinnaṃ brahma sūryādijyotiṣāṃ sākṣibhūtamāyuramṛtamiti ca devā upāsata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tat kāla anavacchinnam brahma sūrya ādi jyotiṣām sākṣi bhūtam āyuḥ amṛtam iti ca devāḥ upāsate iti arthaḥ

original: yoṣito 'gnitvavat dyumaryādatvādikaṃ dhyānārthaṃ kalpitaṃ brahmaṇo yuktamityāha-atrocyata ityādinā /
analyzed: yoṣitaḥ gni tva vat dyu maryāda tva ādikam dhyāna artham kalpitam brahmaṇaḥ yuktam iti āha atra ucyate ityādinā
divaḥ param api iti anvayaḥ
āropyasya dhyeyasya ālambanasya ca sādṛśya niyamaḥ na asti iti āha parasya api iti
bhaviṣyati brahmajyotiṣaḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tathā tathā phalaṃ bhavati'iti śruterityāha-na hīyata iti /
analyzed: tam yathā yathā upāsate tathā tathā phalam bhavati iti śruteḥ iti āha na hīyate iti

original: jñānaphalavadupāstīphalamekarūpaṃ kiṃ na syādata āha-yatra hīti /
analyzed: jñāna phala vat upāstī phalam eka rūpam kim na syāt atas āha yatra hi iti
jñeya eka tvāt iti arthaḥ
dhyeyam tu nānā iti āha yatra tu iti

original: īśvaro jīvarūpeṇānnamattītyannādaḥ annasyāsamantāddātā vā vasu hiraṇyaṃ dadātīti vasudāna iti guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ yo veda sa dhanaṃ vindate,
analyzed: īśvaraḥ jīva rūpeṇa annam atti iti annādaḥ annasya a samantāt dātā vā vasu hiraṇyam dadāti iti vasudānaḥ iti guṇa viśeṣa saṃbandham yaḥ veda sa dhanam vindate
dīpta agniḥ ca bhavati
nāmnaḥ vāc uttamā

original: mano vā pratīkaṃ vāco bhūya iti pratīkaviśeṣadhyānaśrutisaṃgrahārthamādyapadam /
analyzed: manaḥ vā pratīkam vācaḥ bhūyaḥ iti pratīka viśeṣa dhyāna śruti saṃgraha artham ādya padam
saṃnidheḥ śrutiḥ balīyasī iti śaṅkate katham punar iti
atha prathama śruti anusāreṇa carama śrutiḥ nīyate iti āha na eṣa iti

original: sarvanāmnā svasāmarthyena svasya sarvanāmnaḥ sāmarthyaṃ saṃnihitavācitvaṃ tadbalena parāmṛṣṭe satīti yojanā /
analyzed: sarvanāmnā sva sāmarthyena svasya sarvanāmnaḥ sāmarthyam saṃnihita vāci tvam tad balena parāmṛṣṭe sati iti yojanā
arthāt yad pada sāmānādhikaraṇyāt iti arthaḥ

original: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam / BBs_1,1.25 /
analyzed: chandaḥ abhidhānāt na iti ced na tathā cetaḥ ūrpaṇa nigadāt tathā hi darśanam
chandaḥ abhidhānāt brahma prakṛtam na asti iti śaṅkām ekadeśī dūṣayati katham iti
śaṅkām sādhayati na etat ityādinā
catuṣpada tva ādikam pūrvam eva vyākhyātam
yaḥ etām evam iti

original: vedarahasyabhūtāṃ madhuvidyāmevamuktarītyā yaḥ kaścidveda tasyodayāstamayarahitabrahmā prāptirbhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: veda rahasya bhūtām madhu vidyām evam ukta rītyā yaḥ kaścid veda tasya udaya astamaya rahita brahmā prāptiḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: tathāca vedatvādgāyatryāṃ brahmaśabdo yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca veda tvāt gāyatryām brahma śabdaḥ yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
gāyatrī śabdena tad upādāna tvena anugata brahma lakṣaṇāyām bījam anupapattim āha na hi akṣara iti
brahmaṇaḥ pi katham sarva ātmaka tvam
tatra āha kāryam ca iti

original: naca gāyatryā dhyānārthaṃ sarvātmatvāropa iti vācyaṃ,
analyzed: na ca gāyatryāḥ dhyāna artham sarva ātma tva āropaḥ iti vācyam
svatas sarvātmanaḥ dhyāna saṃbhavena asat āropāyoga ādi iti bhāvaḥ
tathā hi darśanam iti sūtra śeṣam vyācaṣṭe tathā anyatra iti
dṛśyate iti darśanam
dṛṣṭam iti arthaḥ

original: etaṃ paramātmānaṃ bahvṛcā ṛgvedino mahatyukthe śastre tadanugatamupāsate /
analyzed: etam paramātmānam bahvṛcāḥ ṛgvedinaḥ mahati ukthe śastre tad anugatam upāsate
etam eva agnirahasye tam etam agniḥ iti adhvaryavaḥ upāsate iti śruteḥ yajurvedinaḥ gnau upāsate

original: etameva chantogāḥ sāmavedino mahāvrate kratau upāsata ityaitareyake dṛṣṭamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: etam eva chantogāḥ sāmavedinaḥ mahāvrate kratau upāsate iti aitareyake dṛṣṭam iti arthaḥ

original: gāyatrīśabdo brahmalakṣaka iti vyākhyāya gauṇa ityāha-apara iti /
analyzed: gāyatrī śabdaḥ brahma lakṣakaḥ iti vyākhyāya gauṇaḥ iti āha aparaḥ iti
sākṣāt eva

original: pūrvaṃ tūpāsyatayā gāyatrīpadenājahallakṣaṇayā gāyatrībrahmaṇī dve api lakṣite /
analyzed: pūrvam tu upāsya tayā gāyatrī padena ajahat lakṣaṇayā gāyatrī brahmaṇī dve api lakṣite
na ca gāyatrī sarvam iti anvaya asaṃbhavaḥ
ghaṭaḥ rūpī iti padārtha eka deśe vyaktau rūpa anvaya vat

original: gāyatrīpadārthaikadeśe gāyatryanugate brahmaṇi pradhāne sarvātmakatvānvayasaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: gāyatrī padārtha eka deśe gāyatrī anugate brahmaṇi pradhāne sarva ātmaka tva anvaya saṃbhavāt iti bhāvaḥ
tathā ca sūtre siddhānta bhāgasya ayam arthaḥ tathā gāyatrī vat catuṣpātva guṇa sāmānyāt

original: ceto brahmaṇi samarpyate yena sa cetorpaṇo gāyatrīśabdastena brahmaṇa eva nigadādabhidhānāt chandobhidhānamasiddhamiti /
analyzed: cetaḥ brahmaṇi samarpyate yena sa cetaḥ ūrpaṇaḥ gāyatrī śabdaḥ tena brahmaṇaḥ eva nigadāt abhidhānāt chandaḥ abhidhānam asiddham iti
adhunā tathā hi darśanam iti śeṣam vyācaṣṭe tathā iti
saṃvarga vidyāyām ādhidaivam agni sūrya candra ambhāṃsi vāyau līyante

te vai ete pañca anye ādhidaivikāḥ

original: pañcānye ādhyātmikāste militvā daśasaṃkhyākāḥ santaḥ kṛtamityucyante /
analyzed: pañca anye ādhyātmikāḥ te militvā daśa saṃkhyākāḥ santaḥ kṛtam iti ucyante

original: santi hi kṛtatretādvāparakalisaṃjñakāni catvāri dyutāni krameṇa caturaṅkatryaṅkadvyaṅkaikāṅkāni /
analyzed: santi hi kṛta tretā dvāpara kali saṃjñakāni catvāri dyutāni krameṇa catur aṅka tri aṅka dvi aṅka eka aṅkāni
tatra kṛtam daśa ātmakam bhavati
caturṣu aṅkeṣu trayāṇām triṣu dvayoḥ dvayoḥ ekasya ca antarbhāvāt

original: evañca daśatvadvārā vāyvādiṣu kṛtatvaṃ virāṭtvaṃ ca dhyeyam /

original: ayo dyūtaṃ, kṛtasaṃjño 'yaḥ kṛtāyaḥ sa vijito yena tasmai,

original: ajahallakṣaṇāpakṣe hi 'vāgvai gāyatrī'iti vāgātmatvaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca iti niruktanāmakatvaṃ ca gāyatryā upādhitvenopāsyatvādupapannataram
analyzed: ajahat lakṣaṇā pakṣe hi vāc vai gāyatrī iti vāc ātmatvam gāyati ca trāyate ca iti nirukta nāmaka tvam ca gāyatryāḥ upādhi tvena upāsya tvāt upapannataram

bhūta ādi pāda vyapadeśa upapatteḥ ca evam

original: nanu 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam'iti prathama gāyatrīśruteḥ kathaṃ lakṣaṇetyāśaṅkya vākyaśeṣagatasarvātmakatvādyanekabalavatpramāṇasaṃvādena
analyzed: nanu gāyatrī vai idam sarvam iti prathama gāyatrī śruteḥ katham lakṣaṇā iti āśaṅkya vākyaśeṣa gata sarva ātmaka tva ādi aneka balavat pramāṇa saṃvādena
tātparya avagamāt iti āha bhūta ādi pāda iti
evam padārtham āha etas ca iti

atra sūtra bhāṣya kārayoḥ bhūta ādibhiḥ catuṣpadā gāyatrī iti saṃmatam
yukti antaram āha api ca iti

brahma padasya chandaḥ vāci tvam uktam nirasyati yat vai tat brahma iti

original: hṛdayasya caturdikṣūrdhvaṃ ca pañca suṣayaḥ santi /
analyzed: hṛdayasya catur dikṣu ūrdhvam ca pañca suṣayaḥ santi

original: teṣu brahmasthānahṛnnagarasya prāgādidvāreṣu krameṇa prāṇavyānāpānasamānodānāḥ pañcadvārapālā iti dhyānārthaṃ śrutyā kalpitam /
analyzed: teṣu brahmasthāna hṛd nagarasya prāc ādi dvāreṣu krameṇa prāṇa vyāna apāna samāna udānāḥ pañca dvāra pālāḥ iti dhyāna artham śrutyā kalpitam

original: tatra hṛdayacchidrasthaprāṇeṣu brahmapuruṣatvaśrutirhṛdi gāyatryākhyabrāhmaṇa upāsanāsaṃbandhitāyāṃ brahmaṇo dvārapālatvādbrahmapuruṣā iti  #
analyzed: tatra hṛdaya chidra stha prāṇeṣu brahma puruṣa tva śrutiḥ hṛdi gāyatrī ākhya brāhmaṇe upāsana a saṃbandhi tāyām brahmaṇaḥ dvārapāla tvāt brahma puruṣāḥ iti

original: divi diva iti vibhaktibhedātprakṛtapratyabhijñā nāstītyuktaṃ nopakṣaṇīyamityāha-tatparihartavyamiti /
analyzed: divi divaḥ iti vibhakti bhedāt prakṛta pratyabhijñā na asti iti uktam na upakṣaṇīyam iti āha tat parihartavyam iti

original: yathā vṛkṣāgraṃ svalagnabhagāvacchinnaśyenasyādhāraḥ sanneva svālagnabhāgāvacchinnasya tasyaiva maryādā bhavati,

pratardana varam te dadāni iti
sa ha uvāca pratardanaḥ

original: yaṃ tvaṃ martyāya hitatamaṃ manyase taṃ varaṃ tvamevālocya mahyaṃ dehīti /
analyzed: yam tvam martyāya hitatamam manyase tam varam tvam eva ālocya mahyam dehi iti
tatas indraḥ idam āha prāṇaḥ asmi ityādi
mukhyam prāṇam nirasitum prajñā ātma tvam uktam
nirviśeṣa cit mātram nirasyati tam mām iti
idam prāṇasya indri devatā tve liṅgam
mukhya prāṇa tve liṅgam āha atha iti
vāc ādīnām deha dhāraṇa śakti abhāva niścaya anantaram iti arthaḥ

original: prāṇasya dehadhārakatvamutthāpakatvaṃ ca prasiddhamiti vaktuṃ khalvityuktam /
analyzed: prāṇasya deha dhāraka tvam utthāpaka tvam ca prasiddham iti vaktum khalu iti uktam
prāṇasya jīva tve vaktṛ tvam liṅgam āhana vācam iti
ānanta tva ādikam brahma liṅgam āha ante ca iti
anekeṣu liṅgeṣu dṛśyamāneṣu balābala nirṇaya artham idam adhikaramam iti agata artham āha aneka liṅga iti
prakṛta brahma vācaka yad śabda balāt jyotiḥ śrutiḥ brahma parā iti uktam
na tathā iha prāṇa śruti bhaṅge kiñcid balam asti
mithas viruddha aneka liṅgānām aniścāyaka tvāt iti pratyudāharaṇa saṃgatyā pūrvapakṣayati tatra iti

original: pūrvaṃ pradhānaprātipadikārthabalāt vibhaktyarthabādhavadvākyārthajñānaṃ prati hetutvena pradhānānekapadārthabalādekavākyatābhaṅga iti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatirvāstu
analyzed: pūrvam pradhāna prātipadika artha balāt vibhakti artha bādhavat vākya artha jñānam prati hetu tvena pradhāna aneka padārtha balāt ekavākya tā bhaṅgaḥ iti dṛṣṭānta saṃgatiḥ vā astu
siddhānte pratyak brahma dhīḥ iti vivekaḥ
tathā brahma para tvena padānām anvaya avagamāt iti hetvartham āha tathā hi iti

original: hitatamatvakarmakṣayādipadārthānāṃ saṃbandho brahmaṇi tātparyaniścāyaka upalabhyata ityuktaṃ vivṛṇoti-upakrama ityādinā /
analyzed: hitatama tva karma kṣaya ādi padārthānām saṃbandhaḥ brahmaṇi tātparya niścāyakaḥ upalabhyate iti uktam vivṛṇoti upakrame ityādinā

original: yaṃ manyase taṃ varaṃ tvameva prayacchetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yam manyase tam varam tvam eva prayaccha iti arthaḥ
sa yaḥ kaścid mām brahma rūpam veda sākṣāt anubhavati

original: tasya viduṣo loko mokṣo mahatāpi pātakena na ha mīyate naiva hiṃsyate na pratibadhyate jñānāgninā karmatūlarāśerdagdhatvādityāha-sa ya iti
analyzed: tasya viduṣaḥ lokaḥ mokṣaḥ mahatā api pātakena na ha mīyate na eva hiṃsyate na pratibadhyate jñāna agninā karma tūla rāśeḥ dagdha tvāt iti āha sa yaḥ iti
sādhu asādhunī puṇya pāpe
tābhāyām a spṛṣṭa tvam
tad kārayitṛ tvam
niraṅkuśa aiśvaryam ca sarvam etat iti iti arthaḥ

original: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin / BBs_1,1.29 /
analyzed: na vaktuḥ ātma upadeśāt iti ced adhyātma saṃbandha bhūmā hi asmin
ahaṅkāra vādena sva ātma vācaka śabdaiḥ ācacakṣe
uktavān iti arthaḥ
vākyasya indra upapāsanā para tve liṅga antaram āha tathā vigraha iti

original: trīṇi śīrṣāṇi yasyeti triśīrṣā tvaṣṭuḥ putro viśvarūpo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ taṃ hatavānasmi /
analyzed: trīṇi śīrṣāṇi yasya iti tri śīrṣā tvaṣṭuḥ putraḥ viśvarūpaḥ nāma brāhmaṇaḥ tam hatavān asmi
rauti yathārtham śabdayati iti rudh vedānta vākyam

original: tanmukhe yeṣāṃ te runmukhāstebhyo 'nyānvedāntabahirmukhān yatīnaraṇyaśvabhyo dattavānasmītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad mukhe yeṣām te rud mukhāḥ tebhyaḥ nyān vedānta bahirmukhān yatīn araṇya śvabhyaḥ dattavān asmi iti arthaḥ
indre prāṇa śabda upapattim āha prāṇa tvam ca iti
vadanti laukikāḥ api iti arthaḥ

original: balavācinā prāṇaśabdena baladevatā lakṣyata iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: bala vācinā prāṇa śabdena bala devatā lakṣyate iti bhāvaḥ
indraḥ hita pradātṛ tva adhitatamaḥ
karma anadhikārāt apāpaḥ iti evam vyākhyeyāni iti āha niścite ca iti
kim indra padena vigraha upalakṣitam cit mātram ucyate uta vigrahaḥ
ādye vākyasya brahma para tvam siddham
na dvitīyaḥ iti āha adhyātma iti
ātmani dehe dhigataḥ iti adhyātmam pratyagātmā
sa saṃbadhyate yaiḥ śarīra stha tva ādibhiḥ indra tanau a saṃbhāvitaiḥ dharmaiḥ te adhyātma saṃbandhāḥ teṣām bhūmā iti arthaḥ
āyuḥ atra dehe prāṇa vāyu saṃcāraḥ

original: astitve prāṇasthitau prāṇānāmindriyāṇāṃ sthitirityarthataḥ śrutimāha-astitva iti /
analyzed: astitve prāṇa sthitau prāṇānām indriyāṇām sthitiḥ iti arthataḥ śrutim āha astitve iti
atha atas niśreyasa ādānam ityādyā śrutiḥ
indriya sthāpaka tva vat deha utthāpaka tvam āha tathā iti
vaktṛ tvam uktvā sarva adhiṣṭhāna tvam darśitam iti āha eti ca upakramya iti
tat tatra nānā prapañcasya ātmani kalpanāyām yathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: loke prasiddhasya rathasyāreṣu neminābhyormadhyasthaśalākāsu cakropāntarūpā nemirarpitā,
analyzed: loke prasiddhasya rathasya areṣu nemi nābhyoḥ madhya stha śalākāsu cakra upānta rūpā nemiḥ arpitā
nābhau cakra piṇḍikāyām arāḥ arpitāḥ

original: evaṃ bhūtāni pañca pṛthivyādīni mīyanta iti,
analyzed: evam bhūtāni pañca pṛthivī ādīni mīyante iti

original: mātrāḥ bhogyāḥ śabdādayaḥ pañceti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ prajñāmātrāsu daśasvarpitāḥ /
analyzed: mātrāḥ bhogyāḥ śabda ādayaḥ pañca iti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ prajñāmātrāsu daśasu arpitāḥ

original: indriyajāḥ pañca śabdādiviṣayaprajñāḥ mīyante ābhiriti mātrāḥ pañca dhīndriyāṇi /
analyzed: indriya jāḥ pañca śabda ādi viṣaya prajñāḥ mīyante ābhiḥ iti mātrāḥ pañca dhīndriyāṇi

original: nemivadgrāhyaṃ grāhakeṣu areṣu kalpitamityuktvā nābhisthānīye prāṇe sarvaṃ kalpitamityāha-prāṇe 'rpitā iti /
analyzed: nemi vat grāhyam grāhakeṣu areṣu kalpitam iti uktvā nābhi sthānīye prāṇe sarvam kalpitam iti āha prāṇe rpitāḥ iti

original: sa prāṇo mama svarūpamityāha-sa ma iti /
analyzed: sa prāṇaḥ mama svarūpam iti āha sa me iti

original: tarhi pratyagātmani samanvayo na tu brahmaṇi,
analyzed: tarhi pratyagātmani samanvayaḥ na tu brahmaṇi
tatra āha ayam iti

original: vijñeyendrastutyartha upanyāso na cetkathaṃ tarhi sa iti pṛcchati-kathamiti /
analyzed: vijñeya indra stuti arthaḥ upanyāsaḥ na ced katham tarhi saḥ iti pṛcchati katham iti

pareṇa
tasya mā ityādinā vākyena iti anvayaḥ
stutim āha etat uktam iti

original: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt / BBs_1,1.31 /
analyzed: jīva mukhya prāṇa liṅgāt na iti ced na upāsā traividhyāt āśrita tvāt iha tad yogāt
deha utthāpanam jīva liṅgam kim na syāt
tatra āha śarīra dhāraṇam ca iti

original: sarve vāgādayaḥ prāṇā ahamahaṃ śreṣṭha iti vivadamānāḥ prajāpatimupajagmuḥ /
analyzed: sarve vāc ādayaḥ prāṇāḥ aham aham śreṣṭhaḥ iti vivadamānāḥ prajāpatim upajagmuḥ
sa ca tān uvāca

original: yasminnutkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataraṃ patiṣyati sa vaḥ śreṣṭha iti tathākrameṇa vāgādipūtkrānteṣvapi mūkādibhāvena śarīraṃ svasthamasthāt /
analyzed: yasmin utkrānte śarīram pāpiṣṭhataram patiṣyati sa vaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ iti tathākrameṇa vāc ādipu utkrānteṣu api mūka ādi bhāvena śarīram svastham asthāt

original: mukhyaprāṇasya tu uccikramiṣāyāṃ sarveṣāṃ vyākulatvāptau tānvāgādīnvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca,
analyzed: mukhya prāṇasya tu uccikramiṣāyām sarveṣām vyākula tva āptau tān vāc ādīn variṣṭhaḥ prāṇaḥ uvāca
yūyam moham mā āpadyatha yatas ham eva etat karomi

original: kiṃ tat, pañcadhā prāṇāpānādibhāvenātmānaṃ vibhajya etadvāti gacchatīti vānaṃ tadeva bāṇamasthiraṃ śarīramavaṣṭabhyāśritya dhārayāmītyarthaḥ
analyzed: kim tat pañcadhā prāṇa apāna ādi bhāvena ātmānam vibhajya etat vāti gacchati iti vānam tat eva bāṇam asthiram śarīram avaṣṭabhya āśritya dhārayāmi iti arthaḥ
dvivacana sahavāsa utkrānti śruteḥ ca na brahma grāhyam iti āha jīva mukhya iti
abheda nirdeśam āhayaḥ vai iti
bhedam āha saha iti

original: yadi jīvamukhyaprāṇayorliṅgādupāstatvaṃ tarhi brahmaṇo 'pi liṅgānāmuktatvādupāsanaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yadi jīva mukhya prāṇayoḥ liṅgāt upāsta tvam tarhi brahmaṇaḥ pi liṅgānām ukta tvāt upāsanam syāt
na ca iṣṭa āpattiḥ upakrama ādinā niścita ekavākyatā bhaṅga prasaṅgāt iti āha na etat evam ityādinā

original: naca svatantrapadārthabhedādvākyabhedaḥ kiṃ na syāditi vācyaṃ,
analyzed: na ca svatantra padārtha bhedāt vākya bhedaḥ kim na syāt iti vācyam
jīva mukhya prāṇayoḥ ukta liṅgānām śakya tayā svātantrya asiddheḥ
aphala padārthasya phalavat vākya artha śeṣa tvena pradhāna vākya artha anusāreṇa tad liṅga nayasya ucita tvāt ca
nahi pradhāna vākya artha brahma liṅgam anyathā netum śakyam
na vā tat ucitam iti āha na ca brahma liṅgam iti
sūtra śeṣam vyācaṣṭe āśrita tvāt ca iti

original: anyatra 'ata eva prāṇaḥ'ityādau vṛtterāśritvādihāpi tasya brahmaliṅgasya yogādbrahmapara eva prāṇaśabda ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: anyatra atas eva prāṇaḥ ityādau vṛtteḥ āśritvāt iha api tasya brahma liṅgasya yogāt brahma paraḥ eva prāṇa śabdaḥ iti arthaḥ
prāṇa ādi liṅgāni sarvātmake brahmaṇi anāyāsena netum āha yat tu ityādinā

original: yasminnetau preryatvena sthitau tenetareṇa brahmaṇā sarve prāṇādivyāpāraṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yasmin etau prerya tvena sthitau tena itareṇa brahmaṇā sarve prāṇa ādi vyāpāram kurvanti iti arthaḥ
viśeṣam pariccheda abhimānam iti arthaḥ
vidyāt iti na vaktuḥ jñeya tvam ucyate
tasya loka siddha tvāt
kintu tasya brahmatvam bodhyate
tad bodha ābhimukhyāya liṅga ādayaḥ iti atra śruti antaram āha yat vācā iti

original: yena caitanyena vāgabhyudyate svakāryābhimukhyena preryate tadeva vāgādiragamyaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yena caitanyena vāc abhyudyate sva kārya ābhimukhyena preryate tat eva vāc ādiḥ agamyam brahma iti arthaḥ

original: tattvaṃpadavācyayoḥ svarūpato bhedasthābhyāmupalakṣyātmasvarūpābhedādekatvaṃ nirdiśyata ityāha-naiṣa doṣa iti /
analyzed: tattvam pada vācyayoḥ svarūpataḥ bheda sthābhyām upalakṣya ātma svarūpa abhedāt ekatvam nirdiśyate iti āha na eṣa doṣaḥ iti
sva matena sūtram vyākhyāya vṛtti kṛt matena vyācaṣṭe athavā iti
upāsanā tri tva prasaṅgāt iti pūrvam uktam
atra tri prakārakasya eka brahma viśeṣa ikasya ekasya upāsanasya vivakṣita tvāt iti arthaḥ
atas na vākyaḥ bhedaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
deha ceṣṭā ātmaka jīvana hetu tvam prāṇasya āyuḥ tvam deha apekṣayā tasya āmukteḥ avasthānāt amṛta tvam
utthāpayati iti uktha tvam iti prāṇa dharmaḥ
jīva dharmān āha atha iti
buddhi prāṇayoḥ saha sthiti utkrānti ukti anantaram iti arthaḥ
atra prajñā padena sa ābhāsā jīva ākhyā buddhiḥ ucyate

original: tasyāḥ saṃbhandhīni dṛśyāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni yathaikaṃ bhavantyadhiṣṭhānacidātmanā tathā vyākhyāsyāma ityupakramyoktam-'vāgeva'ityādi /
analyzed: tasyāḥ saṃbhandhīni dṛśyāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni yathā ekam bhavanti adhiṣṭhāna cit ātmanā tathā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti upakramya uktam vāc eva etyādi
cakṣuḥ eva asyāḥ ekam aṅgam adūduhat ityādi paryāyāṇām saṃkṣipta artham ucyate
utpannāyāḥ asat kalpanāyāḥ sa ābhāsa buddheḥ nāma prapañca viṣayi tvam ardham śarīram

original: arthātmakarūpaprapañcaviṣayitvamardhaṃ śarīramiti militvā viṣayitvākhyaṃ pūrṇaṃ śarīramindriyasādhyam /
analyzed: artha ātmaka rūpa prapañca viṣayi tvam ardham śarīram iti militvā viṣayi tva ākhyam pūrṇam śarīram indriya sādhyam

original: tatra karmendriyeṣu vāgevāsyāḥ prajñāyā ekamaṅgaṃ dehārdhamadūduhat pūrayāmāsa /
analyzed: tatra karmendriyeṣu vāc eva asyāḥ prajñāyāḥ ekam aṅgam deha ardham adūduhat pūrayāmāsa
vāc indriya dvārā nāma prapañca viṣayi tvam buddhiḥ labhate iti arthaḥ
caturthī ṣaṣṭhī arthā

original: tasyāḥ punarnāma kila cakṣurādinā prativihitā jñāpitābhūtamātrā rūpādyartharūpā parastādaparārdhe kāraṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tasyāḥ punar nāma kila cakṣuḥ ādinā prativihitā jñāpitā abhūtamātrā rūpa ādi artha rūpā parastāt apara ardhe kāraṇam bhavati
jñāna kāraṇa dvara artha prapañca viṣayi tvam buddhiḥ prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ buddheḥ sarvārthadraṣṭṛtvamupapādya tanniṣṭhacitpratibimbadvārā sākṣiṇi draṣṭṛtvādhyāsamāha-prajñayeti /
analyzed: evam buddheḥ sarva artha draṣṭṛ tvam upapādya tad niṣṭha cit pratibimba dvārā sākṣiṇi draṣṭṛ tva adhyāsam āha prajñayā iti

original: buddhidvārā cidātmā vācamindriyaṃsamāruhya tasyāḥ prerako bhūtvā vācā karaṇena sarvāṇi nāmāni vaktavyatvenāpnoti,
analyzed: buddhi dvārā cit ātmā vācam indriyam samāruhya tasyāḥ prerakaḥ bhūtvā vācā karaṇena sarvāṇi nāmāni vaktavya tvena āpnoti

original: cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśyatītyevaṃ draṣṭā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśyati iti evam draṣṭā bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: tathāca sarvadraṣṭṛtvaṃ cidātmani draṣṭṛtvādhyāsanimittatvaṃ ca buddherdharma ityuktaṃ bhavati sarvādhāratvāndatvādiḥ brahmadharma ityāha-tā  #
analyzed: tathā ca sarva draṣṭṛ tvam cit ātmani draṣṭṛ tva adhyāsa nimitta tvam ca buddheḥ dharmaḥ iti uktam bhavati sarva ādhāra tvāt da tva ādiḥ brahma dharmaḥ iti āhatā
vā iti
daśa tvam vyākhyātam

original: prajñā indriyajātyā adhikṛtya grāhyā bhūtamātrā vartante,
analyzed: prajñāḥ indriya jātyāḥ adhikṛtya grāhyāḥ bhūtamātrāḥ vartante

original: prajñāmātrā indriyāṇi grāhyaṃ bhūtajātamadhikṛtya vartanta iti grāhya grāhakayormithaḥ sāpekṣatvamuktaṃ sādhayati-yaditi /

original: grāhyeṇa grāhyasvarūpaṃ na sidhyati kintu grāhakeṇa /

analyzed: tasmāt sāpekṣa tvāt etat grāhya grāhaka dvayam vastutas na bhinnam kintu cit ātmani aropitam iti āha
no iti
tat yathā ityādi kṛta vyākhyānam

anya dharmeṇa anyasya upāsanam katham iti āśaṅkya āśrita tvāt iti āha anyatra api iti
upādhiḥ jīvaḥ
tat anya dharmeṇa upāsanam
iyam asaṃgatā vyākhyā
tathā hi na tāvat āruṇya ādi aneka guṇa viśiṣṭa prāpta krayaṇa vat upāsā traya viśiṣṭasya brahmaṇaḥ vidhiḥ saṃbhavati

nā api brahma anuvādena upāsā traya vidhiḥ

tādṛśa vidhi vākyasya atra aśravaṇāt
na ca tam mām āyuḥ amṛtam iti upāḥsva eti atra mām iti jīvena
āyuḥ iti prāṇena
amṛtam iti brahmaṇā sva sva dharmavatā viśiṣṭa upāsanā vidhiḥ iti vācyam
sarveṣām dharmāṇām aśravaṇāt
brahma aśruteḥ ca

original: atra prayojanābhāve 'pi yatra prayojanaṃ tatra bhavatyeva jagadviśeṣaṇaṃ,

original: cetanācetanatvena saṃdigdhe bhūtayonau 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ'iti vākyaśeṣādīśvaratvanirṇaya ityayuktaṃ,

vākya śeṣe bhūtayoneḥ pratyabhijñāpaka abhāvāt iti śaṅkate nanu iti
jani kartṛḥ prakṛtiḥ iti sūtreṇa prakṛteḥ apādāna saṃjñāyām pañcamī smaraṇāt akṣarāt saṃbhavati iti
prakṛti tvena uktā akṣarasya bhūtayoniḥ vākyaśeṣe tasmāt iti prakṛti tva liṅgena pratyabhijñānam asti iti
samādhatte atra ucyate iti
etat kāryam brahma sūkṣma ātmakam nāma rūpam

yat uktam pañcamī anta akṣara śrutyā bhūtayoneḥ pratyabhijñāna da cetana tvam iti
tatra āha akṣarāt paratas iti
na ayam akṣara śabdaḥ bhūtayonim parāmṛśati

original: paravidyādhigamyatvenoktasyākṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ 'akṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ vedā'ityakṣaraśrutyā vedyatvaliṅgavatyā pūrvameva brahmatvena parāmarśādityāha-yeneti
analyzed: para vidyā adhigamya tvena uktasya akṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ akṣaram puruṣam veda iti akṣara śrutyā vedya tva liṅgavatyā pūrvam eva brahmatvena parāmarśāt iti āha yena iti

original: yena jñānenākṣaraṃ bhūtayoniṃ sarvajñaṃ puruṣaṃ veda tāṃ brahmavidyāṃ yogyāya śiṣyāya
analyzed: yena jñānena akṣaram bhūta yonim sarvajñam puruṣam veda tām brahma vidyām yogyāya śiṣyāya
prabrūyāt iti upakramya aprāṇaḥ hi amanāḥ śubhraḥ akṣarāt paratas paraḥ iti ucyamānaḥ
paras bhūtayoniḥ iti gamyate iti arthaḥ

original: tarhi pañcamyantākṣaraśabdārthaḥ ka ityāśaṅkyājñānamiti vakṣyata ityāha-kathamiti /
analyzed: tarhi pañcamī anta akṣara śabda arthaḥ kaḥ iti āśaṅkya ajñānam iti vakṣyate iti āha katham iti
para vidyā iti samākhyayā api tad viṣayasya brahma tvam iti āha api ca iti
nanu pradhāna vidyā api kāraṇa viṣaya tvāt parā iti atas āha para apara vibhāgaḥ iti

original: anityaphalatvenāparavidyāṃ ninditvā muktyarthine brahmavidyāṃ provāceti vākyaśeṣokterityarthaḥ /
analyzed: anitya phalatvena apara vidyām ninditvā mukti arthine brahma vidyām provāca iti vākya śeṣa ukteḥ iti arthaḥ
astu pradhānavidyā api mukti phalatvena parā iti atas āha na ca iti
nanu yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti agre para vidyā viṣayaḥ ucyate
adreśya vākyena tu pradhāna vidyā ucyate iti atas āha tisraḥ ca iti
itas ca bhūtayoneḥ brahmatvam iti āha kasmin iti

original: acetanamātrasyaikāyatanamupādānaṃ tajjñānātkāryajñāne 'pi tadakāryāṇāmātmanāṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: acetana mātrasya eka āyatanam upādānam tad jñānāt kārya jñāne pi tat akāryāṇām ātmanām jñānam na bhavati

original: evaṃ jīve jñāte tadakāryasya bhogyasya jñānaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: evam jīve jñāte tat akāryasya bhogyasya jñānam na bhavati iti arthaḥ
brahmavidyā śabdāt ca bhūtayoniḥ brahma iti āha api ca iti

original: sa brahmavidyāṃ sarvavidyānāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ samāptibhūmiṃ brahmavidyāmuvāca /
analyzed: sa brahma vidyām sarva vidyānām pratiṣṭhām samāpti bhūmim brahma vidyām uvāca
brahmaṇi sarva vidyānām vidyā phalānām ca antarbhāvāt brahmavidyā sarva vidyā pratiṣṭhā

plavante gacchanti iti plavāḥ vināśinaḥ

ṣoḍaśa ṛtvijaḥ patnī yajamānaḥ ca iti aṣṭādaśa

tathā hi ṛtuṣu yācayanti yajñam kārayanti iti ṛtvijaḥ

original: 'patyurno yajñasaṃyoge'iti sūtreṇa patiśabdasya nakāro 'ntādeśo yajñasaṃbandhe vihita iti patnī,
analyzed: patyuḥ naḥ yajña saṃyoge iti sūtreṇa pati śabdasya nakāraḥ nta ādeśaḥ yajña saṃbandhe vihitaḥ iti patnī
evam ṛtvij ādinām a pravṛtti nimittam yajñaḥ iti yajña rūpāḥ

original: etadeva karma śreyo nānyadātmajñānamiti ye mūḍhāstuṣyanti te punaḥ punarjanmamaraṇamāpnuvantītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: etat eva karma śreyaḥ na anyat ātma jñānam iti ye mūḍhāḥ tuṣyanti te punar punarjanma maraṇam āpnuvanti iti arthaḥ

sarva sāmye tathā api aniṣṭa āpatteḥ iti āha api ca sthūlāḥ iti

atra ca īśvaraḥ śuddha cit mātraḥ grāhyaḥ

original: tadvato ya eṣa ityukterna pūrvānukarṣa ityarthaḥ /

original: ya eṣa prāṇavidativadatītyanūdya sa satyaṃ vadediti vidhānānna prāṇaprakaraṇaviccheda iti dṛṣṭāntena śaṅkate-nanviti /

original: satyavacane tvabādhitārthasaṃbandhāllākṣaṇika iti nātra lakṣyavacanavidhirityāha-neti brūma iti /

original: kiñca satyena brahmaṇātivadatīti tṛtīyāśrutyā brahmakaraṇakamativāditvaṃ śrutaṃ,
analyzed: kiñca satyena brahmaṇā ativadati iti tṛtīyā śrutyā brahma karaṇaka mativādi tvam śrutam

original: tasya prakaraṇādbādho na yukta ityāha-śrutyā hītyādinā /

atra iti

original: evaṃ satyeneti śrutyā prakaraṇaṃ bādhyamityuktvā tuśabdenāpi bādhyamāha-prakṛteti /

tat na

pura svāminaḥ eva tad antar stha tva saṃbhavāt na anya apekṣā iti arthaḥ
vyāpinaḥ ntar stha tvam katham iti atas āha manaḥ iti
ākāśa padena daharam anukṛṣya ukta upama ādikam brahma abheda vivakṣayā bhaviṣyati iti āha ākāśa iti

original: nanu jīvasyākāśapadārthatvamayuktamityāśaṅkya tarhi bhūtākāśa eva daharo 'stu tasminnantaḥsthaṃ kiñciddhyeyamiti pakṣāntaramāha-na cātreti
analyzed: nanu jīvasya ākāśa padārtha tvam ayuktam iti āśaṅkya tarhi bhūtākāśaḥ eva tasmin antar stham kiñcid dhyeyam iti pakṣa antaram āha na ca atra iti
tad viśeṣaṇa tvena ādhāra tvena daharākāśasya tad śabdena upādānāt iti arthaḥ

original: yadvā anveṣyatvādiliṅgāddaharasya brahmatvaniścayāt 'ākāśastalliṅgāt'ityanena gatārthatvamiti śaṅkātra nirasanīyā /
analyzed: yat vā anveṣya tva ādi liṅgāt daharasya brahma tva niścayāt ākāśaḥ tad liṅgāt iti anena gatārtha tvam iti śaṅkā atra nirasanīyā

original: anveṣyatvādeḥ paraviśeṇatvena grahaṇāddarahasya brahmatve liṅgaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: anveṣya tva ādeḥ para viśeṇa tvena grahaṇāt darahasya brahmatve liṅgam na asti iti arthaḥ
apahatapāpma tva ādi liṅga upeta ātmaka śrutyā kevala ākāśa śrutiḥ bādhyā iti siddhāntayati parameśvaraḥ ityādinā
ākāśasya ākṣepa pūrvakam iti saṃbandhaḥ
tam ācāryam prati yadi brūyuḥ

original: hṛdayameva tāvadalpaṃ tatratyākāśo 'lpataraḥ kiṃ tadatrālpe vidyate yadvicāryā jñeyamiti,
analyzed: hṛdayam eva tāvat alpam tatratya ākāśaḥ lpataraḥ kim tat atra alpe vidyate yat vicāryā jñeyam iti
tadā saḥ ācāryaḥ brūyāt ākāśasya alpatā nivṛttim iti arthaḥ
vākyasya tātparyam āha tatra iti
nivartayati
ācāryaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
nanu ākāśa śabdena rūḍhyā bhūtākāśasya bhānāt katham tad nivṛttiḥ iti āśaṅkya āha yadi api iti
nanu rāma rāvaṇayoḥ yuddham rāma rāvaṇayoḥ iva eti abhede pi upamā dṛṣṭā iti ced

original: na abhede sādṛśyasyānanvayena yuddhasya nirūpamatve tātparyādayamananvayālaṅkāra iti kāvyavidaḥ /
analyzed: na abhede sādṛśyasya ananvayena yuddhasya nirūpama tve tātparyāt ayam ananvaya alaṅkāraḥ iti kāvya vidaḥ
pūrva uktam anūdya nirasyati nanu ityādinā
sītā āśliṣṭaḥ iva ābhāti kodaṇḍa prabhayā yutaḥ ityādau prabhā yoga sītā āśleṣa rūpa viśeṣaṇa bhedāt bheda āśrayaṇam ekasya eva
śrī rāmasya upamāna upameya bhāva siddhi artham a gatya kṛtam iti anudāharaṇam draṣṭavyam
na evam atra āśrayaṇam yuktam
vākyasya alpatva nivṛtti paratvena gati sadbhāvāt

original: kiñca hārdākāśasyāntaratvātyāge alpatvena vyāpakabāhyākāśasādṛśyaṃ na yuktamityāha-apiceti /
analyzed: kiñca hārda ākāśasya antara tva atyāge alpa tvena vyāpaka bāhya ākāśa sādṛśyam na yuktam iti āha api ca iti
āntara tva tyāge tu atyanta abhedāt na sādṛśyam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu hārdākāśasyālpatvanivṛttau tāvattve ca tātparyaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-ubhayeti /
analyzed: nanu hārda ākāśasya alpatva nivṛttau tāvattve ca tātparyam kim na syāt iti atas āha aubhaya iti
atas lpau anivṛttau eva tātparyam iti bhāvaḥ
evam ākāśa upamita tvāt dahara ākāśaḥ na bhūtam iti uktam
sarva āśraya tva ādi liṅgebhyaḥ ca tathā iti āha na ca ityādinā

original: vigatā jighatsā jagdhumicchā yasya so 'yaṃ vijighatsaḥ /
analyzed: vigatā jighatsā jagdhum icchā yasya saḥ yam vijighatsaḥ

original: na tu brahmaṇaḥ puramiti ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ svasvāmibhāvo grāhyaḥ 'nirapekṣeṇa tatsāpekṣaṃ bādhyam'iti nyāyādityāha-atra brūma iti /
analyzed: na tu brahmaṇaḥ puram iti ṣaṣṭhī arthaḥ sva svāmi bhāvaḥ grāhyaḥ nirapekṣeṇa tat sāpekṣam bādhyam iti nyāyāt iti āha atra brūmaḥ iti

original: śarīrasya brahmaṇa tadupalabdhisthānatvarūpe saṃbandhe mānamāha-sa iti /

original: nanu brahmaśabdasya jīve 'pyannādinā śarīravṛddhihetau mukhyatvānna ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ kathañcinneya ityata āha-athaveti /

original: padārthasmaraṇasyāpi padajñānāntarabhāvitvāttena saṃskārasahitāntyavarṇātmakapadasya jñānaṃ na yuktamityakṣarārthaḥ /

api śabdaḥ paraspara āśraya dyotana arthaḥ
etena nirastaḥ
tasya varṇa smṛti mātra hetu tvena artha dhī hetu tva ayogāt
na ca antya varṇa sāhityāt artha dhī hetu tvam
kevala saṃskārasya tu varṇa smṛti hetu tvam iti vācyam
artha dhī pūrva kāle bhāvanāyāḥ jñāna abhāvena artha dhī hetu tva ayogāt
na ca varṇa smaraṇena anumitā sā antya varṇa sahita artha dhī hetuḥ iti vācyam
tad kāryasya kramikasya varṇa smaraṇasya api antya varṇa anubhava anantara bhāvi tvena tena anumita bhāvanānām antya varṇa sāhitya abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ
varṇānām artha bodhaka tva saṃbhave phalam āha tasmāt iti

original: sphoṭe 'pi kiṃ mānamityāśaṅkyaikaṃ padamiti pratyakṣapramāṇamityāha-sa ceti /

original: yathā ratnatattvaṃ bahubhiścākṣuṣapratyayaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāsate tathā gavādipadasphoṭo
analyzed: yathā ratna tattvam bahubhiḥ cākṣuṣa pratyayaiḥ sphuṭam bhāsate tathā gavādi pada sphoṭaḥ

original: gakāradyekaikavarṇakṛtapratyayaiḥ sphoṭaviṣayairāhitāḥ saṃskārā bījaṃ yasmin citte
analyzed: gakāra di ekaika varṇa kṛta pratyayaiḥ sphoṭa viṣayaiḥ āhitāḥ saṃskārāḥ bījam yasmin citte

original: citte ekaṃ gauritipadamiti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣastadviṣayatayā spaṣṭamavabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: citte ekam gauḥ iti padam iti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣaḥ tad viṣaya tayā spaṣṭam avabhāsate iti arthaḥ
anena varṇa anvaya vyatirekayoḥ sphoṭa jñāne nyathā siddhiḥ
na ca ekasmāt varṇāt samyak sphoṭa abhivyaktiḥ

original: yena varṇāntaravaiyarthyaṃ kintu ratnavadbahupratyayasaṃskṛte citte samyaksphoṭābhivyaktirityuktaṃ bhavati /

nanu eka padam ekam vākyam iti pratyayaḥ pada vākya sphoṭayoḥ na pramāṇam
tasya varṇa samūha ālambana smṛti tvāt iti āśaṅkya niṣedhati na ca iti
sphoṭasya jagat hetu tva artham nitya tvam āhatasya ca iti
nanu tat eva idam padam iti pratyabhijñā bhramaḥ
udātta ādi bheda pratyayāt iti atas āha bheda iti
ācārya saṃpradāya ukti pūrvakam siddhāntayati varṇāḥ eva iti
varṇa atirikta sphoṭa ātmaka śabdasya anubhava anārohāt iti arthaḥ
sādṛśya doṣāt iyam bhrāntiḥ iti śaṅkate sādṛśyāt iti

original: vapanānantaraṃ ta eveme keśā iti dhīrbhrāntiriti yuktaṃ,
analyzed: vapana anantaram te eva ime keśāḥ iti dhīḥ bhrāntiḥ iti yuktam
bheda dhī virodhāt

original: sa evāyaṃ varṇa iti dhīstu pramaiva,
analyzed: saḥ eva ayam varṇaḥ iti dhīḥ tu pramā eva
bādhaka abhāvāt iti āhana iti
go tva ādi pratyabhijñā vat varṇeṣu pratyabhijñā gavādi viṣayā iti śaṅkate pratyabhijñānam iti
vyakti bhede siddhe pratyabhijñāyāḥ jāti viṣaya tvam syāt

original: yattvayā pītaṃ jalaṃ tadeva mayā pītamityādau /
analyzed: yat tvayā pītam jalam tat eva mayā pītam iti ādau

original: na tatheha vyaktibhedaḥ siddha iti pariharati-na /
analyzed: na tathā iha vyakti bhedaḥ siddhaḥ iti pariharati na
vyakti iti
na tu etat iti
vyakti anya tva jñānam iti arthaḥ
udātta tva ādi viruddha dharma tvāt vyakti bhedaḥ numāna siddhaḥ iti anuvadati nanu iti
bheda pratyayasya kumbha kūpa ākāśa bheda pratyaya vat aupādhika bheda viṣaya tvāt anyathā siddheḥ ananyathā siddha vyakti aikya pratyabhijñayā nirapekṣa svarūpa ālambanayā
bādhaḥ iti uttaram āha atra iti
tālu ādi deśaiḥ koṣṭha stha vāyu saṃyoga vibhāgābhyām vicitrābhyām vyaṅgya tvāt varṇeṣu vaicitrya dhīḥ iti arthaḥ
kalpanā gauravāt ca varṇeṣu svatas bhedaḥ na asti iti āha api ca iti
anantāḥ gakāra ādi vyaktayaḥ tāsu pratyabhijñāna artham ga tva ādi jātayaḥ tāsu ca udātta tva ādi bhedasya aupādhika tvam iti
kalpanāt varam varṇa vyakti bheda mātrasya aupādhika tva kalpanam iti vyakti ānantyasya jātīnām
ca kalpanam ayuktam iti arthaḥ
nanu bhedasya bādhaka abhāvāt na aupādhika tvam iti atas āha eṣaḥ iti
astu tarhi pratyaya dvaya prāmāṇyāya bheda abhedayoḥ satya tvam
tatra āha katham hi iti
ubhayoḥ eka tva virodhāt bhedaḥ aupādhikaḥ eva iti arthaḥ

original: nanu vāyusaṃyogāderatīndriyatvānna tadgatavaicitryasyodāttatvādervarṇeṣu pratyakṣāropaḥ saṃbhavatītyaruciṃ vadiṣyansvamatamāha-athaveti /
analyzed: nanu vāyu saṃyoga ādeḥ atīndriya tvāt na tad gata vaicitryasya udātta tva ādeḥ varṇeṣu pratyakṣa āropaḥ saṃbhavati iti arucim vadiṣyan sva matam āha athavā iti
dhvani dharmāḥ udātta tva ādayaḥ dhvanya bheda adhyāsāt varṇeṣu bhānti iti arthaḥ
praśna pūrvakam dhvani svarūpam āhakaḥ iti
avatarati sa dhvaniḥ iti śeṣaḥ
varṇa atiriktaḥ śabdaḥ dhvaniḥ iti arthaḥ
samīpam gatasya puṃsaḥ tāra tva manda tva ādi dharmān svagatān varṇeṣu saḥ eva āropayati iti āha pratyāsīdataḥ ca iti
ādi padam vivṛṇoti tat iti
nanu avyakta varṇaḥ eva dhvaniḥ na atiriktaḥ iti atas āha varṇānām iti

original: pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇā anuvartante dhvanirvyāvartata iti bheda ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: pratyuccāraṇam varṇāḥ anuvartante dhvaniḥ vyāvartate iti bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: anyathā vācike jape varṇeṣvavyakteṣu dhvanibuddhiḥ syāt,
analyzed: anyathā vācike jape varṇeṣu avyakteṣu dhvani buddhiḥ syāt

original: dundubhyādidhvanau śabdatvamātreṇa gṛhyamāṇe ayamavyakto varṇa iti dhīḥ syāditi mantavyam /
analyzed: dundubhi ādi dhvanau śabda tva mātreṇa gṛhyamāṇe ayam avyaktaḥ varṇaḥ iti dhīḥ syāt iti mantavyam

original: evaṃ dhvanyupādhikatve svamate guṇaṃ vadanvāyūpādhikatve pūrvoktāmaruciṃ darśayati-evañcetyādinā /
analyzed: evam dhvani upādhikatve sva mate guṇam vadan vāyu upādhikatve pūrva uktām arucim darśayati evam ca ityādinā
astu kaḥ doṣaḥ
tatra āha saṃyoga iti
vāyu saṃyoga ādeḥ aśrāvaṇa tvāt iti arthaḥ
tasmāt śrāvaṇa dhvaniḥ eva udātta tva ādi āropa upādhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: evaṃ viruddhadharmakadhvanīnāṃ bhede 'pi na teṣvanugatā varṇā bhidyanta ityuktam /
analyzed: evam viruddha dharmaka dhvanīnām bhede na teṣu anugatāḥ varṇāḥ bhidyante iti uktam
tat eva dṛṣṭāntena draḍhayati api ca iti

original: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviruddhānekavyaktiṣvabhinnaṃ gotvaṃ tathā dhvaniṣu varṇā abhinnā evetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yathā khaṇḍa muṇḍa ādi viruddha aneka vyaktiṣu abhinnam go tvam tathā dhvaniṣu varṇāḥ abhinnāḥ eva iti arthaḥ
udātta ādiḥ dhvaniḥ tad bhedena hetunā varṇānām api iti yojanā
pratyabhijñā virodhāt iti akṣara arthaḥ

original: yadvā udāttatvādibhedaviśiṣṭatayā pratyabhijñāyamānatvādvarṇānāṃ bheda ityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntena nirasyati-apiceti /
analyzed: yat vā udātta tva ādi bheda viśiṣṭa tayā pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt varṇānām bhedaḥ iti āśaṅkām dṛṣṭāntena nirasyati api ca iti

original: varṇānāṃ sthāyitvaṃ prasādhya teṣāmeva vācakatvaṃ vaktuṃ sphoṭaṃ vighaṭayati-varṇebhyaśceti /
analyzed: varṇānām sthāyi tvam prasādhya teṣām eva vācaka tvam vaktum sphoṭam vighaṭayati varṇebhyaḥ ca iti
kalpanām asahamānaḥ āśaṅkatena iti

original: cakṣuṣā darpaṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau mukhavacchrotreṇa varṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau vinaiva hetvantaraṃ sphoṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityāha-jhaṭitīti /
analyzed: cakṣuṣā darpaṇa yuktāyām buddhau mukha vat śrotreṇa varṇa yuktāyām buddhau vinā eva hetu antaram sphoṭaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti āha jhaṭiti iti

original: yasyāṃ saṃvidi yor'tho bhāsate sā tatra pramāṇam /
analyzed: yasyām saṃvidi yaḥ arthaḥ bhāsate sā tatra pramāṇam

original: ekapadamiti buddhau varṇā eva sphuranti nātiriktasphoṭa iti na sā sphoṭe pramāṇamityāha--na /
analyzed: eka padam iti buddhau varṇāḥ eva sphuranti na atirikta sphoṭaḥ iti na sā sphoṭe pramāṇam iti āha
asyāḥ api ityādinā

original: nanu gopadabuddheḥ sphoṭo viṣayo gakārādīnāṃ tu vyañjakatvādanuvṛttirityata āha--yadi hīti /
analyzed: nanu go pada buddheḥ sphoṭaḥ viṣayaḥ gakāra ādīnām tu vyañjaka tvāt anuvṛttiḥ iti atas āha yadi hi iti
vyaṅgya vahni buddhau vyañjaka dhūma anuvṛtteḥ adarśanāt iti arthaḥ
varṇa samūha ālambana tva upapattaiḥ na sphoṭaḥ kalpanīyaḥ

original: nanu nityavibhūnāṃ varṇānāṃ kathaṃ kramaḥ kathaṃ vā padatvajñānenārthadhīhetutvaṃ,

original: etatkramaitatsaṃkhyāvanta etadarthaśaktā iti gṛhītāḥ santaḥ śrotuḥ pravṛttikāle tathaiva
