original: sthirāṇi gatyādisāmānyāni kramaviśeṣavanti gṛhītasaṃgatikānyarthabodhakānīti kḷpteṣu sāmānyeṣu prakriyā saṃcārayitavyā na tvakḷptaḥ sphoṭaḥ  #
analyzed: sthirāṇi gati ādi sāmānyāni krama viśeṣavanti gṛhīta saṃgatikāni artha bodhakāni iti kḷpteṣu sāmānyeṣu prakriyā saṃcārayitavyā na tu akḷptaḥ sphoṭaḥ  /

original: vyavahārāvicchedājjñāyate ceti vedasyānapekṣatvena prāmāṇye na kaścidvirodhaḥ syāt /

original: nirlepalaye tu saṃbandhanāśāt punaḥ sṛṣṭau kenacitpuṃsā saṃketaḥ kartavya iti puruṣabuddhisāpekṣatvena vedasyāprāmāṇyaṃ,
analyzed: nirlepa laye tu saṃbandha nāśāt punar sṛṣṭau kenacid puṃsā saṃketaḥ kartavyaḥ iti puruṣa buddhi sāpekṣa tvena vedasya aprāmāṇyam

mahāpralaye pi nirlepa layaḥ siddhaḥ

original: tathāca saṃskārātmanā śabdārthatatsaṃbandhānāṃ satāmeva punaḥ sṛṣṭāvabhivyakternānityatvam /

original: viṣamasṛṣṭau hi saṃketāpekṣā na tulyasṛṣṭāviti pariharati-tatredamityādinā /

original: sa eva svabhāvaḥ prakṛtirvāsaneti ca gīyate /

original: evaṃ karmaṇāṃ sṛṣṭisādṛśyamuktvā svopādāne līnakāryasaṃskārarūpaśaktibalādapi sādṛśyamāha-pralīyamānamiti /
analyzed: evam karmaṇām sṛṣṭi sādṛśyam uktvā sva upādāne līna kārya saṃskāra rūpa śakti balāt api sādṛśyam āha pralīyamānam iti

original: avidyāyāṃ līnakāryātmakasaṃskārādanyāḥ śaktayo na kalpyāḥ manābhāvādrauravācca /

original: ato 'vidyātatkāryādanyāḥ śaktayo na santi ātmāvidyaiva tacchaktiriti siddhānta ityarthaḥ /

original: bhāvidṛṣṭyā yajamāno 'gniḥ annādo 'ragnirahaṃ syāmiti kāmayitvā kṛttikānakṣatrābhimānidevāyāgnaye aṣṭasu kapāleṣu pacanīyaṃ havirniruptavānityarthaḥ

original: hāreṇa niṣkeṇa yukta itvā gantā ratho hāretvā sa ca gobhiḥ saha he śūdra,
analyzed: hāreṇa niṣkeṇa yuktaḥ itvā gantā rathaḥ sa ca gobhiḥ saha he śūdra
tava eva astu kim alpena anena mama gārhasthya anupayoginā iti bhāvaḥ
arthi tva ādi saṃbhave śreyaḥ sādhane pravṛttiḥ ucitā svābhāvika tvāt iti nyāya upetāt liṅgāt iti āha tasmāt iti
sūtrāt bahis eva siddhāntayati na śūdrasya adhikāraḥ ityādinā
āpātataḥ viditaḥ veda arthaḥ yena tasya iti arthaḥ

original: adhyayanavidhinā saṃskṛto vedastadutthamāpātajñānaṃ ca vedārthavicāreṣu śāstrīyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tadabhāvācchūdrasyārthitvādisaṃbhavanyāyāsiddhernāsti  #
analyzed: adhyayana vidhinā saṃskṛtaḥ vedaḥ tad uttham āpāta jñānam ca veda artha vicāreṣu śāstrīyam sāmarthyam tad abhāvāt śūdrasya arthi tva ādi saṃbhava nyāya asiddheḥ na asti
vedānta vicāra adhikāraḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yadvādhyayanasaṃskṛtena vedena vidito niścito vedārtho yena tasya vedārtheṣu vidhiṣvadhikāro nānyasya,
analyzed: yat vā adhyayana saṃskṛtena vedena viditaḥ niścitaḥ veda arthaḥ yena tasya veda artheṣu vidhiṣu adhikāraḥ na anyasya
anadhīta vedasya api veda artha anuṣṭhāna adhikāre dhyayana vidhi vaiyarthya āpātāt
atas phala paryanta brahmavidyā sādhaneṣu śravaṇa ādi vidhiṣu śūdrasya anadhikāraḥ iti arthaḥ
adhīta veda artha jñānavat tva rūpasya adhyayana vidhi labhyasya sāmarthyasya abhāvāt iti nyāyasya tulya tvāt
yajña padam veda artha apalakṣaṇa artham iti āha nyāyasya sādhāraṇa tvāt iti
tasmāt śūdraḥ iti tad śabda parāmṛṣṭa nyāyasya yajña brahma vidyayoḥ tulya tvāt iti arthaḥ
pūrva uktam liṅgam dūṣayati yat iti
asāmarthya nyāyena arthi tva ādi saṃbhava nyāyasya nirasta tvāt iti arthaḥ
nanu niṣāda sthapatim yājaya iti iti atra adhyayana abhāvaḥ niṣāda śabdāt niṣādasya iṣṭau iva
śūdra śabdāt śūdrasya vidyāyām adhikāraḥ astu iti āśaṅkya saṃvarga vidyāyām adhikāram aṅgīkaroti kāmam iti
tad viṣaya tvāt tatra śruta tvāt iti arthaḥ

asāmarthya nyāya virodhena anya para śabdasya svārtha bodhi tva asaṃbhavāt iti matvā aṅgīkāram tyajati arthavāda iti

original: tathaivātrāpi śarīrātsamutthāya mṛtvā paraṃ jyotirādityākhyamupasaṃpadya taddvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā svasvarūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vaktavyam
analyzed: tathā eva atra api śarīrāt samutthāya mṛtvā param jyotiḥ āditya ākhyam upasaṃpadya tad dvārā brahma lokam gatvā sva svarūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate iti vaktavyam
samutthāya upasaṃpadya iti ktvā śrutibhyām jyotiṣaḥ rciḥ ādi mārga stha tva bhānāt iti arthaḥ

original: ato mārgasthasūryopāstyā kramamuktiparaṃ vākyamiti prāpte siddhāntayati-evamiti /
analyzed: atas mārga stha sūrya upāstyā krama mukti param vākyam iti prāpte siddhāntayati evam iti

original: vyākhyeyatvenopakrānta ātmaivātra jyotiḥśabdena vyākhyena iti jyotirvākyenaikavākyatāprayojakaprakaraṇānugṛhītottamarapuruṣaśrutyā vākyabhedakajyotiḥśrutirbādhyeti  #

original: avayavāḥ pradhānasya rajādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayaḥ tairnimittairlohitādiśabdaiḥ pradhānamucyata ityarthaḥ /

original: tathāca na dvitīyapañcaśabdajanaśabdayoḥ samāsaṃ vināntyasyākārasyodāttatvaṃ pūrveṣāmanudāttatatvaṃ ca ghaṭate 'samāsasya'iti sūtreṇa samāsasyāntodāttavidhānāt

original: 'anudāttaṃ padamekavarjam'iti ca sūtreṇa yasminpade udāttaḥ svarito vā yasya varṇasya
analyzed: anudāttam padam eka varjam iti ca sūtreṇa yasmin pade udāttaḥ svaritaḥ vā yasya varṇasya

original: vidhīyate tamekaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭaṃ tatpadamanudāttaṃ bhavatīti vidhānādeva māntrikāntodāttasvareṇaikapadatvaniścayaḥ

original: yo mantradaśāyāmanudāttaḥ svarito vā sa brāhmaṇadaśāyāmudātto bhavatītyapavāda āśritaḥ /

tathā ca antyāt ākārāt pūrveṣām anudāttānām udātta tvam brahmaṇā avasthāyām prāptam
udāttam anudāttam antyam iti sūtreṇa mantra daśāyām udāttasya ānantyasya para lagna tayā uccāryamāṇasya anudātta tvam vihitam

original: tathā cāntyanakārāduparitana ākāra ākāśaścetyanena śliṣṭatayā paṭhyamāno 'nudātto bhavati,
analyzed: tathā ca antya nakārāt uparitanaḥ ākāraḥ ākāśaḥ ca iti anena śliṣṭa tayā paṭhyamānaḥ n udāttaḥ bhavati
ayam anta anudātta svaraḥ pāribhāṣikaḥ tena brāhmaṇa svareṇa eka pada tvam niścīyate iti
prakaṭa artha kāraiḥ tu pāṭhaka prasiddhaḥ nta udātta svaraḥ pāribhāṣikaḥ iti vyākhyātam

original: antānudāttaṃ hi samāmnātāraḥ pañcajanaśabdamadhīyata iti pāṭhakaprasiddhirasiddheti /

original: yasmin pañca pañcajanā ityantānudātto brāhnasvara iti vibhāgaḥ /

original: janapañcakamekaṃ pañcakānāṃ pañcakaṃ dvitīyamiti pañcakadvayaṃ tasya pañcapañceti grahaṇaṃ netyakṣarārthaḥ /

original: pañcānāṃ pūlānāṃ samāhārā ityatra 'saṃkhyāpūrvo dviguḥ'iti samāso vihitaḥ /

original: tato 'dvigoḥ'iti sūtreṇa ṅīpo vidhānāt samāhārapratītau samāhārāḥ katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ pañcetipadāntarānvayo yuktaḥ /
analyzed: tatas dvigoḥ iti sūtreṇa ṅīpaḥ vidhānāt samāhāra pratītau samāhārāḥ kati iti ākāṅkṣāyām satyām pañca iti pada antara anvayaḥ yuktaḥ

original: svapnasṛṣṭīnāṃ pratyahamanyathātvena so 'hamiti pratyabhijñāyamāne draṣṭaryapi nānātvaṃ prasajyetetyāha-atiprasaṅgāditi /
analyzed: svapna sṛṣṭīnām pratyaham anyathātvena saḥ ham iti pratyabhijñāyamāne draṣṭari api nānātvam prasajyeta iti āha atiprasaṅgāt iti

adhunā aṅgīkāram ca iti
kimartham tarhi śrutayaḥ sṛṣṭim anyathā anyathā vadanti iti āśaṅkya sṛṣṭau atātparya jñāpanāya iti āha bhavet ityādinā
atātparya artha virodhaḥ na doṣāya iti atātparyam sādhayati nahi iti
phalavat brahma vākya śeṣa tvena sṛṣṭi vākyānām arthavat tva saṃbhavāt na svārthe pṛthak phalam kalpyam

original: śuṅgena kāryeṇa liṅgena kāraṇabrahmajñānārthatvaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmuktvā kāraṇasyādvayatvajñānaṃ phalāntamāha-mṛdādīti /

original: evaṃ niṣphalāyāmanyārthāyāṃ sṛṣṭau tātparyābhāvādvirodho na doṣa ityatra vṛddhasaṃmatimāha-tathāceti /
